author: {'steamid': '76561198424025795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1691045748}
review:
I really wanted to like this game, truly. It's not a bad game it's just that for CCG players is just nothing new...

Pros:
* Addition of card speed and two ways of mana (level and mana) is a fun twist to the mechanics
* Nice art
* Fast gameplay

Cons:
* Card properties and abilities are literally a copy-paste of MTG and a few other CCG games, nothing new or complex inside them
* Once you unlock the free decks, the in-game currency for every win you have is short to nothing, impossible to keep growing if you don't open your wallet.
* For a game released 7 years ago the quantity of cards and heroes is pretty, and I mean, pretty short. Not only you keep getting the same cards every pack you open, but limits A LOT your deck construction and strategy.

If you just love CCG then give it a try, but honestly I'd stick to the old-schoolers.

*

author: {'steamid': '76561198149188189', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1684991697}
review:
Lo jugué antes de que estuviera en Steam y la verdad me gusto.

El juego es muy bueno, una lastima que no logró sobrevivir. Creo que el motivo principal es el poco contenido (ediciones) y la regularidad. Además la interfaz no cambió nada desde que salió, la interfaz está igual.
Algo que note son los colores, no es que sean apagados ni muy vivos, es que no se los ve lindos, no se porque me da esa sensación, ¿la combinación, el tono?

Agarra lo bueno de Magic y de Hearthstone. 
Por un lado de Hearthstone el héroe con su poder, con el plus que se pueden tener hasta 3 poderes (si se tienen las fuentes). Evita, en mi opinión, lo malo de Hearthstone que es la aleatoriedad  que hacen que el juego se vuelve más de suerte que de habilidad.
Por el lado de Magic algunos tipos de cartas, como los artefactos, las auras y lo más importante, las fuentes (maná). Me parece acertado que la misma carta te da maná y te haga robar (maná neutro como en Hearthstone) sumado a que te define el mazo con el Dominio (el color en Magic). Además agregaron el buscador de Fuentes entre las primeras cartas, es casi imposible que te falten fuentes, algo que puede pasar en magic, evitando en gran medida el Mana Screw pero no el Mana Flood, lo cual soluciona el 50% del problema.

Lo poco que vi de las últimas ediciones, a pesar de ser pocas, erán totalmente nuevas, sin relleno. Quizá por esto último no sobrevivió, la gente buscará cantidad frente a calidad para creer que "tenemos mucho contenido nuevo".

review:
I'll put in about as much effort into this review as the dev's did making this sad, hearthstone/mtg wannabe game:

*Terrible UI.
  *The game area splitting in two is novel, but that's it, It gets REAL annoying.
  *Can't read a unit's stats without clicking on the card which is counter intuitive and slows the game to a crawl. This happens in EVERY GAME because you need to see your unit's SPEED TO ASSIGN BLOCKS.
*Obnoxious values for gold purchases. I WILL NOT and WILL NEVER pay money for such a transaction if said transaction IS MORE THAN THE PRICE OF A NEW GAME.
* Obnoxious gold values for new characters.
  *150,000 for a new champ?! F and U. You only get about 200 gold for winning! I'm not going to grind out 700 wins just to get one, thanks. I'm not a f***ing timelord.

*YAWN* another hearthstone/mtg knock-off without any development effort put in. (they'd have changed the card visuals on the game area by now, and allowed you to make the battle area stay on the table, otherwise.

Nothing to see here, move along.)

UPDATE:

They just advertised their "final update". Yeah this is a total con now, don't bother. They only update this trash heap every six or so months anyway.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963472189', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1670805593}
review:
A virtual deck builder and battling collectable card game like Magic the gathering with its own unique spin on things

7/10 Overall

Pros
- Great artwork
- Good game mechanics that are unique
- Decent graphics
- Incorporates interesting strategy based play

Cons
- Play control to perform and undo things are somewhat unintuitive what things do
- Combos are hard to learn due to game mechanics
- Monster combat is a bit annoying with the whole speed thing among other complex and unneccesarry things
- Overall map is poor
- Most of the game UI is poorly made
- I dislike the deck builder/skill level and the mana system. it seems over complicated.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025572655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2362, 'last_played': 1622177252}
review:
This game was very good 3-5 years ago. It was just straight better than MtG and Hearthstone, its two obvious inspirations, and was way more than a mash up of the two. It had an actually fair F2P model where you could do 90% of your daily quests against the AI and thus earn all the cards for free without just being trounced by people who did pay. The art wasn't always great but there were never full on stinkers. 

Unfortunately the game is no longer supported. I did have a lot of fun with this game over the years but I can't really recommend it right now. I'm leaving a positive review because of my good times but unless the creator gets struck with a sudden burst of inspiration to continue the game or you somehow get a time machine to go back to like 2018 I can't recommend seriously getting into it. Bot matches to waste time can be fun though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996919908', 'num_games_owned': 1532, 'num_reviews': 875, 'playtime_forever': 4303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4303, 'last_played': 1465935563}
review:
[h1]Wie Magic, nur anders [/h1]

[b]Gameplay[/b]
“Spellweaver” ist ein Kartenspiel, dass sich auf den ersten und zweiten Blick stark an “Magic: The Gathering” orientiert. Wir haben 5 Farben, auf deren Basis wir unser Deck aufbauen. Diese 5 Kartentypen sind sich dabei genau so unterschiedlich, wie wir es vom Klassiker der Kartenspiele kennen. Es ist kostenlos spielbar und damit stellt sich natürlich die Frage, wie viel Geld man in dem Spiel lassen kann. Ich würde sagen, so mittelmäßig viel, weil der Umfang ja auch begrenzt ist. Aber ist es notwendig? Nein, ganz sicher nicht. Auch ohne Echtgeldausgaben kann man sich seine Karten verdienen, nur zu Beginn ist man hier etwas stärker eingeschränkt. Da man aber das Spiel eh erst kennenlernt, ist das wirklich nicht schlimm.

[b]Story[/b]
Abseits vom Universum, in dem das Spiel spielt, finde ich es erstaunlich, dass das Spiel im Grunde nur von einem Entwickler stammt, der das Spiel über Jahre weiterentwickelt hat. Seit 2022 soll es zwar keinen weiteren Support geben, aber das Spiel ist weiterhin verfügbar. Die Community ist zwar klein, aber besteht überwiegend aus Liebhabern des Spiels und diese sind sehr freundlich.

[b]Grafik/Sound[/b]
Die Grafik ist zwar nicht besonders, aber trotzdem sind die Artworks echt in Ordnung. Die Musik fand ich etwas eintönig, aber nach ein paar Stunden macht man die ja eh in der Regel aus.

[b]Fazit[/b]
„Spellweaver“ ist leider unter den großen Brüdern wie „Hearthstone“ oder [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1284410/GWENT_The_Witcher_Card_Game/]GWENT[/url] immer schon etwas untergegangen, bietet aber ein sehr ausbalanciertes Gameplay mit guten Ideen. Es ist kostenlos, nicht Pay2win und ganz klar einen Blick wert. Eine beachtliche Leistung, so ein gutes Spiel mit so wenig Personal hinzukriegen und über die Jahre zu erhalten. Auch wenn es keine Neuerungen mehr geben wird, lohnt sich doch ganz klar ein Blick. Hier kann man trotzdem noch eine Menge Spielstunden lassen!


Ich habe schon so eine TCGs und CCGs gespielt und in [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Drakeschool] meiner Steamgruppe[/url] reviewt. Schau dort doch mal vorbei!

author: {'steamid': '76561198053496312', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1937, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1612556454}
review:
Very good Mtg clone. Decent to very good artwork (while a bit generic), solid gameplay mechanics and enough choice in resource management and battle tactics. I haven't spent a dime yet since I'm still exploring the factions' basic starter decks but I may get hooked enough to open the wallet.

Important improvements over Magic The Gathering are hero cards and the ability to attack creatures with other creatures (provided they have at least the same speed) and the ablity to draw a card whenever you play a resource (once per turn limit), so you don't get mana flooded too much. When you don't draw enough resources after 1 mulligan you can swap one card to scrye for a resource in the top 5 cards. It's not perfect but protects pretty well against the many flood/screws that are still pestering Magic since it's inception almost 30 years ago.

Speed points seems to be a bit too important. I would also like the gameboard to be zoomed in more because everything's so tiny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014508339', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 14249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13970, 'last_played': 1611680863}
review:
This game scratches the MTG itch, but also improves on it in several important ways:

1) Decks can be paired with heroes, allowing for greater variety in matchups

2) Speed system for creatures: lower speed creatures cannot attack/block higher ones, essentially opening up a third dimension other than Attack and Defense.  

3) Revised mana system: a 'land' (what the game calls shrines) when deployed can be used to give you +1 mana permanently and draw a card, or to gain one Faction level, which are prerequisites for all other cards. A card, for example, may need 2 Corruption-Faction levels and One Nature-Faction level, along with 2 mana to cast, essentially making this 2-mana card a turn 5 card at the earliest. Some nonbasic 'shrines give your Hero an additional skill to cast too if you select the +1 mana option. Sometimes though, you need it to give you Faction Levels instead, an example of a meaningful decision you've got to make.   

There's also an offering system where you can trade in a card from your hand to look at the top 5 cards of your deck, select a shrine from any of them, and place it in your hand. This helps reduce mana flow issues. 

I uninstalled this game previously because it was too addictive. I reinstalled because they were giving away a whole lot of free cards, and I agree with their recently-announced change in game direction - see https://spellweaver-tcg.com/spell_news/full-valiant-dawn-playset-and-more/ for more details.

author: {'steamid': '76561198375377633', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1609120560}
review:
让我十分纠结的一款卡牌游戏，spellweaver这款游戏冷到什么程度？进入游戏跳过教程，直接匹配，3把居然是同一个人。我拿这新手套组对战一个熟练的老玩家，体验极差。可见玩家数量已经缩减在一个超小圈里。无法找到同样水平新手对战的情况下只好选择单人冒险模式。即便胜利挫败郁闷感也比较强没有爽快感可言。
作为一个炉石传说竞技场12胜，昆特牌，游戏王，都玩过比较熟练的老手，
我新入门spellweaver的感受就如此糟糕。那么没怎么玩过卡牌游戏的新人感受如何可以想象。
究其原因应该是游戏核心机制理念的问题，看制作人简历写的是万智牌大赛的冠军之作。
事实证明太过专业的人做出来的东西不一定会考虑到大众的心情。只服务于同样专业的玩家。
就像金庸笔下风轻扬的独孤九剑不是谁都有资质能愉快的学会一样。游戏内容过于硬核，不同于现代炉石传说为代表的主流卡牌游戏，游戏还使用攻防后胜利者召唤单位自动回满血的设计。再加上攻防分离，阻拦，多人阻拦，前后排，还要考虑速度，复杂程度比现代主流的卡牌游戏要高许多。出现任何一点偏差基本就无法挽回。对方召唤生物可能一直在场上不死从头到尾追这玩家打，玩家却拿他一点办法都没有。就像被人欺负按在地上打这个感觉相当挫败。虽然熟悉游戏规则后可以进行对抗，内容设计很值得人研究。但从游玩的角度来讲这种规则的游戏是很艰涩孤僻的。无法推荐给任何人，但又不能否定他做的不好。终归是属于极少部分人的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198288058950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2721, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1711307813}
review:
Вы когда-нибудь слышали или говорили такую фразу, как "Не нравится? Иди и сделай свою игру."
Скорее всего да и не раз. Возможно, авторы Spellweaver (всего несколько человек - болгарский чемпион MTG, художник да пара программистов) тоже как-то услышали эту фразу в свой адрес. Но всё пошло не так, как обычно... Ибо они действительно сделали свою игру, доказав при этом, что клонировать механики других популярных игр без каких либо существенных изменений вовсе не обязательно. А заодно давно известную истину о том, что всё гениальное - просто.
Берём простоту, удобство и динамику Hearthstone. Убираем рандом. Добавляем тактическую глубину и знакомые механики из MTG. Стряхиваем в корзину десятки лишних фаз. Жгём напалмом ненавистные манаскрю и манафлуд. Осталось лишь добавить свою изюминку в виде скорости существ... Всё. Тортик готов. И единственная его проблема такая же, как и у любой хорошей вкусняшки - его мало. В данном случае, пока что мало карт и ещё меньше игроков. Но и то и другое поправимо со временем.
Может это и не лучшая ККИ всех времён (если смотреть объективно и на данный момент), но шансы стать ею однажды определёно есть.

Это была объективная часть.

10/10 !!! Это шедевр !!!

Это была субъективная часть.

P.S. Перевод на великий в марте-апреле.
P.P.S. Графика, звук и прочее на вкус и цвет... все дела.
Но во-первых, это инди (не ждите чудес).
Во-вторых, разработчики выложились на максимум. И так как это не наши чиновники. Все деньги были потрачены так, что игра выглядит и играется достойно. Глаза не кровоточат, баги не достают, разве что новые звуки немного не в тему. Но думаю поправят.
P.P.P.S. Про самое важное забыл - донат. Игра буквально заставляет искать вас причины задонатить. Ну в том плане, что я хотел помочь разработчикам, но и для себя что-то получить... И в итоге, пришлось просто задонатить, ибо по совести - они это заслужили. А так смысла в донате пока что нет. Всё и без того доступно. Даже на рубашки карт можно насобирать кристаллов в игре, хоть и не быстро. Как бы они не обанкротились с такой политикой...

author: {'steamid': '76561198082608972', 'num_games_owned': 946, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 12378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11224, 'last_played': 1640903673}
review:
Do you like MtG? Do you dislike power creep or rather high prices of various digital versions of MtG (not to mention the p2w aspect of getting cards in games that already aren't free)? This game is for you. Not only is it the best Magic clone I've ever seen, but in some aspects it's actually more complex than Magic, the most obvious example being the dual cost of playing cards.

The GUI looks a bit dated, but the cards and card backs are beautiful. Also, the game is super light on the system resources - and overall pretty impressive for a love project of a very small team.

The devs are responsive; the community isn't big, but it's thriving - and rather helpful.

Is it pay to win? I don't think so. I've fallen a bit behind, but I'm pretty sure you can still grind out all of the cards in the game - it does take a while, but it's doable, especially since you can unbind unwanted cards for shrines (the Spellweaver version of MtG lands), which you can in turn use to craft the cards you want. Note that "unwanted" means "the majority of cards in the game as soon as you have four copies of a given card" since you can't have more than four copies of most cards in your deck(s). Moreover, the rarer the card is, the more shrines you'll get from unbinding it, and you can even convert one shrine type into another.

The only stuff you can't grind out are some card backs and a single type of a booster, since those are bought for crystals, and crystals are, you guessed it, bought for real money. However, from time to time you can get a promo code for a small amount of crystals (and there are monthly promo codes for various stuff!).

My main complaint are the AI battles - they need to be updated, as the opponents don't use newer cards. As a solo player I would also like to be able to unlock all nodes on the map in solo mode, but, well, to each their own.

TL;DR: Feels as satisfying as MtG - and you can play it for free! (Though, if you end up liking it, I strongly recommend supporting the devs by buying the campaign DLC or at least some crystals!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198099947946', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 41603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39666, 'last_played': 1694194770}
review:
Um dos melhores Card Games que eu já joguei. Existe uma comparação óbvia com Hearthstone e com Magic the Gathering, e eu me arrisco a dizer que o Spellweaver trouxe o melhor dos dois mundos. Ele não te dá uma mana por turno igual ao Hearthstone, mas precisa de terrenos, semelhante ao Magic. Felizmente, os terrenos de Spellweaver fazem mais do que gerar um mana, então você não sofre de Flood. Aliás, você quer fazer terreno todo turno por 20 turnos, ao passo que em Hearthstone você para em 10, e no Magic você quer parar em 5~6. Além disso, ele traz o sistema de trocar 1 carta da mão por um terreno que estiver nas 5 primeiras cartas do baralho, então ele também facilita contra a Zica.
Além de todas essas coisas relativas a mana, ele ainda possui vários heróis, cada um com sua própria habilidade, o que trás uma dinâmica excelente para o jogo.
E, a melhor parte: Existe interação no turno do oponente, coisa que o Hearthstone não tem. O jogo é maravilhoso, vale muito a pena jogar.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995285008', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 2935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2868, 'last_played': 1619634204}
review:
The single best digital-only TCG I have ever played. If this were available physically, I would buy every release. It is deep, interesting, and fun to play with my friends. I think it fills a void left by the loss of Upper Deck's World of Warcraft TCG. I love building decks in Spellweaver, and the (lone) dev releases new cards often enough to keep the game fresh. Speed is a novel mechanic that works well and is fun to build around. There are plenty of playstyles--aggro, control, midrange, etc.--and none are SO dominant in all metas that the game feels stale. The developer balances cards regularly (on an as-needed basis), and is deeply involved with the community.

Which is, unfortunately,  very small. You will run into the same players, and often. The small community can get a little toxic, sometimes trash talk goes too far, too fast. It's a TCG, and the TCG community has a lot of passionate people in it. Unfortunately, this can (very rarely) result in tirades in local chat about "those [expletive] [slur] who play [deck type] should [expletive] kill themselves." Usually somebody talks them down, or maybe they get timeouts or bans? I don't know. Moderation doesn't feel very public, unless I'm just not looking in the right spots. I'll admit, I don't use their discord community, where perhaps more moderation discussion goes on.

Spellweaver is a fantastic digital-only trading card game. It's a game I know I'll want to play long after its service eventually ends. I'm certain I will be immensely sad when that day comes, but I'm making memories of it now. Play it with your friends, make memories too.

Regret nothing. Play Spellweaver now.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155045661', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 6523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2015, 'last_played': 1669182512}
review:
It's similar to the many other fantasy collectible card games, including Magic: The Gathering, but also has a few key differences that make it surprisingly fun to play.  There seems to be an element of strategy that you don't quite get in other games.  This probably stems mostly from the clever combination of creatures having different speeds and there being a 'support line' and a 'front line' that distinguish what different creatures are capable of in relation to combat.  These can make the game a little tricky to get used to at first, but are what makes the game shine.

The 'mana' or 'resource' system is also cleverly designed.  It manages to retain some of the randomness of Magic: The Gathering that adds variety to the game and tension to the deck design in ways that other card games, like Skyrim: Legends and Hearthstone, fail to do.  Yet it also mostly avoids the serious 'mana screw' or 'mana flooding' that Magic: The Gathering fails to do.  Basically, it strikes the perfect balance between giving you enough ways to get resources to play your cards, while not taking away from the decision-making and strategy both when deck-building and playing.

Decent graphics; a few different modes to keep things interesting (although online play against real people is limited due to it not being a particularly well-known game); and regular quests to keep you in coin if you don't want to make any purchases (but also some really decent packages if you do).

The main disadvantage is that it's no longer seriously supported.  The developer has said they'll keep the servers up and running, and when a server goes down they are usually quick to fix it, but there won't be new content, updates, etc.  Still, it's such a fun game it'd be well worth trying out for a bit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209712651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1664619717}
review:
游戏是好游戏，各系风格挺鲜明的，但卡牌质量差距有点大，像紫色派生物普遍高速，生物质量高，还有贴皮各种buff，配合起来简直了，看绿色，基本上高速身材弱鸡，前期踢不倒人基本gg。顺带这游戏速度设定挺别扭的，打比方说就是慢一点的千军万马拦不下一个跑的稍快的人，要是能改善速度机制的话就好了，那么多速度档位也限制了各系生物卡的发展。非游戏平衡方面，优点不说了，缺点：1，非全屏界面下游戏字体太小，而且不可调节，长时间看的眼痛。2我理想卡牌游戏让人拉开差距的应该仅限于新老手之间的打牌思路，而不是啥所谓的等级，不懂为啥非要弄个等级机制，但对战给的经验又少之又少，20级以后升的巨慢，奖励拿不到→没钱买包→组卡强度低→被血虐挫败感升高→反复在弃坑边缘徘徊，新人追赶机制太差……
补充：服务器时断时续的连接失败是一大败笔，匹配机制做的很差
总的来说这游戏优缺点参半吧，有让人眼前一亮的地方，但也有太多地方让人觉得冗杂，不平衡

author: {'steamid': '76561198174344005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 2365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2365, 'last_played': 1526571462}
review:
Spellweaver est un jeu de cartes stratégique vraiment plaisant, grâce à un gameplay très bien étudié. Celui-ci se situe entre Hearthstone et Magic (quoi que bien plus proche de Magic).
Il garde d'Hearthstone les héros et leur pouvoir, et de Magic les mécaniques générales.

Le petit plus par rapport à Magic, c'est qu'il limite le hasard dû à la pioche. En effet, chaque carte de "mana" permet aussi de piocher une carte, ce qui évite de se retrouver rapidement à cours de carte.
De plus, si on est en manque de carte mana, on peut une fois par tour se défausser d'une carte de sa main, en échange d'une de ses fameuses cartes mana (si elle se trouve dans les 5 premières cartes de notre deck).
De quoi éviter les parties frustrantes à cause d'une pioche désavantageuse !

Seul le système de blocage étrange ne m'a pas convaincu (pour le coup ils auraient mieux fait de reprendre celui de Magic).

Concernant le modèle économique, Spellweaver fait un peu moins bien que la concurrence. S'il est free to play, le mode campagne ne peut s'acheter qu'avec de l'argent réel (et n'est qu'en anglais, contrairement au reste du jeu), et le jeu est moins généreux en carte après les premières heures de jeu passées.
C'est dommage, car du coup il faudra obligatoirement passer à la caisse pour se monter un deck compétitif (le prix des cartes reste toutefois raisonnable).

Au final, je ne recommande pas ce jeu, car il y a tout simplement mieux dans le genre (comme Shadowverse).

Note détaillée :
- Réalisation : 2,5/4
- Immersion : 1,5/3
- Challenge : 2,5/3
- Gameplay : 4/5
- Contenu : 4/5
Bonus/malus : +0,5 pour le prix (free to play, mais la campagne solo ne s'achète qu'avec de l'argent réel et n'est pas traduite)

NOTE FINALE : 15/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198057354128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1591720045}
review:
The map UI where you get the quests is ugly.
That's about it for the cons, rest of the game is exceptional. I was utterly shocked to find out it's maintained by a single guy.
The cards look cool, are interesting, the speed mechanic makes you think really hard when building a deck.
Also, each hero can have 3 skills, one base, the other two freely interchangeable using cards so you can customize your hero's playstyle to your heart's content.
The AI is really good (for me at least), and I never felt I needed to play pvp to progress.

Really, other than the rather dull-looking out of battle UI (the map only, the card UI looks rather elegant imo), the game is excelent and I had tons of fun.
Oh, you can play it on android too, easy as downloading it and putting the same account in, so you have that freedom when you're not home.
Criminally underplayed game, honestly.

review:
Хорошая игра 
+Действительно разный геймплей за разные фракции
+Много "своего" а не взятого у конкурентов
+Приятная картинка
+Много ПВе и ПВп заданий с наградами
+Почти все (кроме рубашек карт) можно получить без доната
+Различные герои со своими способностями
+Балланс существа/святилища(или мана) не такой рандомный как в той же ETG
Минусы
-Малый онлайн(но новичкам это даже хорошо т к вам часто будут ставить бота -соперника а не профи с собранной колодой)
-Героев трудновато открывать(они даются рандомно каждые 5 ур-йи их можно купить но дороговато)
-Многие ключевые карты трудно выбить/или долго (дорого) крафтить.
-В ПвП готовьтесь превозмогать- вывели на поле толпу- её спели спелом/законтрили убер-юнитом, вывели убер-юнита- его убили дешевым спелом/переманили на тёмную сторону... Разместили супер артефакт- его сломали...
 В общем если ищите интересную ККИ и готовы потратить 20+ часов на изучение(!) механик и игры то эта игра для вас.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109249803', 'num_games_owned': 1865, 'num_reviews': 508, 'playtime_forever': 18402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18402, 'last_played': 1557258770}
review:
[h1] СКАЗ О МЕРТВЫХ ККИ: ЧУЖАЯ ОСНОВА, ДОРАБОТАННАЯ С УМОМ  [/h1]

[code] Не уверен, насколько сие явление распространенное, но, думаю, что некоторых геймеров в какой-то момент определенно посещает мысль - а что там, за пределами "известного мира"? Так ли действительно хороши топовые представители жанра, или где-то в глубине прячется тот самый hidden gem, который полученными впечатлениями затмит собой все ААА-проекты? Вот именно такие размышления двигали мной, когда вдоволь наигравшись в MtG и HS, я решил попробовать для себя нечто совсем новое. 

Вот именно с этой мыслью мы с братом в далеком 2017 году отправились знакомиться с новой для нас в тот момент карточной фэнтези Spellweaver. Вообще, надо заметить, что мы оба - большие фанаты разных ККИ, перепробовали и переиграли уже много во что, и ничего особенного от данного проекта не ожидали. И были удивлены - одновременно приятно, и не очень.  [/code]

[u] [b] ๑۩۩๑ УВЕСИСТАЯ БОЧКА МЁДА ๑۩۩๑ [/b] [/u]

Начнем с хорошего. Разработчики Spellweaver - болгарская студия Dream Reactor, в состав которой входят прожженные игроки в Magic the Gathering, икону современных ККИ. Загоревшись желанием создать более совершенную версию своей любимой карточной игры, они приступили к работе над новым проектом, куда бережно перенесли все хорошее, что было в прародительнице и привнесли полезные нововведения, на которые стоило бы обратить внимание самим создателям MtG.  

Игровая концепция и процесс очень напоминают старушку-Магию: мы имеем карты шести цветов - белый (рыцари, ангелы и усиливающие заклинания), зеленый (эльфы, кентавры и ускоряющие заклинания), синий (гномы, джинны и магия иллюзий), красный (орки, гоблины и магия, наносящая урон), черный (скелеты, зомби и воскрешение существ) и фиолетовый (темные эльфы, мутанты и заклинания, воздействующие на существ противника). Новички при входе выбирают колоду одного цвета, и по мере приобретения опыта открывают новые, получая бонусы и монеты для покупки бустеров с картами. Лишние карты можно утилизировать (привет Hearthstone), получив пыль определенного цвета для последующего крафта более полезных картонок. 

Система боя тоже практически идентична MtG - на начало мы получаем определенное количество карт и можем пересдать "руку", чтобы набрать более удачные сочетания. В ходе боя нам необходимо выкладывать земли определенных типов, которые потом будут давать нам ману для сотворения соответствующих заклинаний. 

Наверное, многим MtGшникам знакома ситуация, когда вроде все нужные карты пришли в руку, а нужных земель на их разыгрывание все нет и нет, а? Существенным отличием от MtG в Spellweaver является возможность один раз за ход обменять неудачно вышедшую карту на землю того типа, что есть в колоде. Этот элемент справедливости, нужно заметить, существенно дорабатывает игровой процесс в лучшую сторону. 

Еще одной необычной фишкой Spellweaver является деление поля аж на четыре полосы (помимо двух стандартных есть еще две "дальние", куда дотянуться не так-то просто и можно удобно запрятать вспомогательных существ поддержки до тех пор, пока они не "дойдут" до нужной кондиции. 

Помимо стандартных параметров сила/здоровье/цена у каждого призванного юнита имеется характеристика "скорость". Она определяет, может ли Ваше существо быть заблокировано, и, в зависимости от количества "галочек", позволяет наиболее шустрым существам без проблем проскакивать для мордобоя оппонента, минуя даже самых опасных стражей врага. 

Система "дэйликов" - ежедневных заданий с наградами - здесь тоже реализована куда интереснее, чем в компьютерных MtG. У нас есть глобальная карта мира Spellweaver, в разных точках которой периодически что-то происходит, и нам с этим предстоит разобраться. Конечно, без привычных квестов в стиле "разыграйте столько-то карт в таком-то цвете" тоже не обошлось, но их приятно разбавили заданиями иных типов, в том числе сражениями с разными компьютерными оппонентами. 

У игры приятная музыка, достойный дизайн и вообще все сделано с большой любовью к проекту. Авторы трепетно относятся к балансу и прислушиваются к мнению аудитории, постоянно внося правки, изменения и доработки. Добавляются новые режимы, сюжетная предыстория и много других вкусностей. В игре есть микротранзакции, но абсолютно спокойно можно играть и без вкладывания кровно заработанных. 

[u] [b] ๑۩۩๑ ЖИРНАЯ ЛОЖКА ДЕГТЯ ๑۩۩๑ [/b] [/u]

Вы спросите, почему же, при всем многообразии плюсов я так давно не заходил в игру? Проблема в темпах ее развития. Проект в силу ограниченности ресурсов его создателей, всю дорогу развивался очень медленно, кардпул если и пополнялся, то мелкими шагами и с большими перерывами по времени. Желающих играть от этого, естественно, не прибавлялось, особенно на фоне динамично развивающихся Hearthsotne, MtG Arena и им подобных. На момент моего последнего входа в игру я уже собрал всю коллекцию карт, прошел сюжетку и выжал максимум из того, что предлагали мне разработчики. Вполне возможно, что за время моего отсутствия там добавили десяток-другой карт и еще что-то интересное, но желания возвращаться в игру только за этим пока не возникало. 

В 2022 году разработчики официально объявили о том, что выпускают последний патч для игры и на этом поддержка клиента временно замораживается. Судя по тому, что следом за этим пошла новость о новых проектах студии, едва ли стоит ждать возвращения старой гвардии в лоно этого проекта. Справедливости ради, Dream Reactor клятвенно заверили игроков, что сервера Spellweaver будут жить до последнего, и закрытие в ближайшее время проекту не грозит. Однако, даже с учетом такой слабо-утешительной мысли нужно понимать, что для любой коллекционной карточной игры любой застой фактически означает смерть проекта. Увы. 

[u] [b] ๑۩۩๑ ПЛЮСЫ И МИНУСЫ  ๑۩۩๑ [/b] [/u]

+ ККИ с оригинальной доработкой MtG-шной основы
+ Продуманный и сбалансированный кардпул
+ Своя авторская вселенная с собственным каноном
+ Целый ряд интересных идей и геймплейных решений
+ Разнообразие режимов, включая сюжетные
+ Красивый дизайн карт и игры в целом
+ Великолепная музыка 
+ Креативная система ежедневных заданий
+ Реально играть без транзакций
+ Набор достижений Steam

- Игра официально заброшена

[u] [b] ๑۩۩๑ СТОИТ ЛИ ИГРАТЬ?  ๑۩۩๑ [/b] [/u]

Обычно в рамках рубрики про "мертвые ККИ" я публикую отрицательные обзоры. В этот раз хотелось бы сделать исключение. Да, рекомендовать Spellweaver кому-либо в нынешних условиях отсутствия обновлений и живых игроков, разумеется, не имеет большого смысла, однако сама по себе игра оставила после себя достаточно приятное впечатление. Ребята из Dream Reactor действительно попытались стряхнуть пыль с набивших оскомину традиционных идей и привнести в классическую коллекционку свою изюминку, а, возможно, даже и не одну. 300+ часов мне с лихвой хватило, чтобы испробовать все имеющиеся режимы и получить от игры все, что она могла мне предоставить, но в случае, если проект все же получит развитие, как знать, быть может, я еще решусь попробовать себя в роли местного Мастера Заклинаний.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299311002', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 951, 'last_played': 1581409764}
review:
Wer Magic spielt oder gespielt hat, dem rate ich von Spellweaver ab.
Es gibt zum Teil gleiche Eigenschaften, die aber unterschiedliche Effekte haben.
Als Beispiel "Fliegend". Bei Magic können nur Kreaturen die selber fliegend sind oder Reichweite(hier ist reichweite = erstschlag auch bescheuert) haben, diese Blocken/Angreifen. Hier hat dies irgendwie keinerlei Bedeutung, ausser das die Kreatur in der Unterstützungsreihe steht.
Extrem verwirrend, hat mir schon öfter ne Niederlage beschert.

Ausserdem ist das Spiel ziemlich tot. Ranglisten suche klappt so gut wie nie, die angebotenen Turniere finden aufgrund Spielermangels nicht statt.
Davon ab finde ich persönlich den Shop überteuert und die Funktionsweise, wie man Karten herstellt sehr merkwürdig.
Von daher keine Empfehlung meiner Seits.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284327339', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 23499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16094, 'last_played': 1705936285}
review:
Практически всё в этой игре хорошо:атмосфера,созданные музыкой и тактическими ходами,красивыми изображениями карт,возможностью участвовать в турнирах...Если немного пошарить в интернете  можно получить реферальную ссылку от кого-нибудь и соответственно карт и денег... 
    Присоединяйтесь к дискорду и сможете посмотреть  предложения колод,оповещения о турнирах ,обсудить игру и просто узнать новости.Правда только на английском языке.А сама игра имеет перевод на русский,который выбирается в нижнем правом углу когда логинишься.
    Поначалу выполняешь задания,которые могут быть сложными сначала при старте,но постепенно можно поднабраться карт и навыков.Игра  содержит в себе динамику HS и тактику MTG .Можно спокойно поиграть за чашечкой чая или кофе .В механиках  разобраться просто...
     Для такого количества  создателей,бюджета и не сильной раскрутки ,игра очень хороша.Тут даже не жалко пожертвовать копеечку на развитие проекта...Единственное,что онлайн хромает из-за низкого  уровня рекламы,и естественно зависит от  стыковки  когда наибольший онлайн у нас и за рубежом...Вообщем игра,приятная,донят может ускорить процесс коллекционирования,но вообще  можно обойтись и без него...Удачи!

review: Великолепная коллекционная карточная игра. Гармоничное сочетание шедевров жанра, таких как MTG, HS, а так же Берсерк: Герои. Дифференцированная механика мана-базы, добавление многих, новых и оригинальных элементов игры, безусловно увеличивающих интерес к процессу. Очень гибкая система подбора оппонента, начиная с лёгкого ИИ, заканчивая игроками про-уровня. Качественно разработанная система поощрения за участие в любых матчах/играх, будь то быстрый бой с компьютером или турнир с реальными игроками.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068300266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 70668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60056, 'last_played': 1596771318}
review:
This game is both challenging and/or soothing to play depending on my mood.  Always new cards to acquire, new decks to build, multiple daily quests to satisfy, new card packs are fun to open.  Good players are out there for a challenge or just for fun play.  With just a little practice most AI battles are won.  Not for everyone (wait times for some modes (like Trials) can be long (so I mostly ignore Trials), but Spellweaver is a fit for me.

This game is truly free to play.  User can if desired buy cards or an adventure that gives cards.  Also, after playing for a while, making a purchase to support these dedicated developers may be your choice.  But, you are free to advance without spending a cent if desired.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032091365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1610190764}
review: So I am a sucker for any card game.  I have literally played about 14000 games of Hearthstone (and that's just ranked), as well as many many hours into Elder Scrolls:Legends, Magic: Arena and Gwent, Slay the Spire, etc..and have literally tried almost every other card game released.  This one has definitely garnered my attention.  It is quite like Magic and a little bit of HS, but is different enough so far to gain some of my time daily. I am also not one of those "I hate RNG" card game purists, which is why I think Hearthstone is one of the greatest card games ever...however, I have not seen much RNG in this game so far (everything on the cards seems quite straightforward),  but the multilevel mana/corruption system is quite interesting.  The tutorial system can be a bit vague but you just have to read the cards really and put a few games under your belt.   I still have yet to finish the main tutorial to unlock all the decks, but this card game is good enough so far that I will continue with it.  Will be happy to get to the point where I can buy packs and craft cards!

review:
I like the game and it has great developer support. With bug fixes, updates and a discord channel for direct communications. The core game play is very good. You can manage your cards if you need a shrine by drawing one and returning one to the deck, the art is pleasing,  there is actual strategy involved in play8ing and deck creation and you can earn all cards through playing or the games crafting system.

It may look like a simple CCG but it does have a learning curve to become proficient, some card mechanics are not clearly explained so you must try them out to learn them and when I play it seems to be the same group of people I play with. So a small player base but an active one.

review: Есть карточки. Игра которую я удалил по причине постоянных проблем и обновлений! Задолбали! Обучение не понятное, механика таких игр дико тупая и сложая! Помните игрушка нужна для удовольствия и лёгкого время провождения а не пыток. Игры не должны заси рать Ваш мозг и разум пустой информацией! Просьба не писать оскорбления из-за неприязни. Если Вы не согласны то это Ваше право и мнение. Но если Вы не понимаете что я написал, то Вы действительно активно гробите своё драгоценное время жизни на мусор.

review: This game is alright for a fair few hours with decent progression with no money needed to play and have a good time. However, this small community and I mean minute community banks mostly on AI battles in quickplay as most of the time you will be the only person in que to play the game. Most tournaments are cancelled due to lack of player base and when doing freeroll matches with other players that have stuck to the game you will have minimal chances to win against players that have put money into the game or sunk over 1000 hours into it. AI event battles that you can play to earn gold as part of quests under the title of extreme and hard doesn't improve upon AI choice making and intelligence all that is done is an unfair starting advantage is provided to the AI causing a player to fight a long uphill battle.

review:
Good. This is a card game with a nice amount of cards and strategies. Collecting cards is not that hard even if, as expected, very grinding. I've played several card games before and this one stands by its own. Easy to learn and gets addictive.

Little bugs now and then. Runs fine on Win 7.

Seems like not much new content gets added lately. Some colors are pretty weak by their own, probably they think to balance them later but who knows when? There are not many players. Many tournaments and even friendly games are just without rivals. Nevertheless, there are daily missions and you can challenge the AI that is not so amazing but compensates by cheating often. I suggest getting The Holy Child cause is a campaign that will also give you a whole deck and something to do while you find another opponent.  For a game that is free to play it's pretty generous. Hope developers have the resources to keep updating it and adding new content. To spend money you need to feel that you're not wasting it in something that might not see any more stuff or that will not increase the player base.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119415980', 'num_games_owned': 458, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1561653007}
review:
Spellweaver  Steam’e  düşmüş mükemmel  bedava bir oyun. Oyunumuz strateji tabanlı bir kart oyunu. Kütüphanemize yeni bir soluk getireceğe benzeyen oyun Dream Reactor tarafından 01 Şubat 2016 tarihinde oyunculara sunuldu.
Hearthstone oynayanınız var mı bilmiyorum fakat kart oyunlarını seviyorsanız mutlaka oynamışsınızdır ya da oynamalısınız. Spellweaver oyunu diğer kart oyunları gibi oldukça fazla strateji gerektiriyor. Bir saldırıyı yapmadan önce ya da defansı mutlaka düşünmelisiniz. Bir sonraki hamleleri hesaba katmalısınız. Oyunda sıra size geçtiğinde bekleme süresi tanınmış bu süre botlara karşı oynadığınızda 45 dakika, bir oyuncuya karşı oynadığınızda ise 20 dakika. Rakibiniz biraz uzun düşündüğünde bu süre sıkıntı yaratabiliyor.

Spellweaver oyununa ilk girdiğinizde training oynuyorsunuz yani alıştırma etapları. Bu oyunlar sonunda size bir adet deck seçme hakkı tanıyor. Bu deckler;

Goblin Assault : Oynama zorluğu kolay olan bu deckin avantajı çok fazla creature yani yaratık çıkarabilmesi. Bu yöntemle azar azar fakat çok sayıda hasar veriyorsunuz.

Vampiric Implants : Oynama zorluğu orta düzey olan bu deckte ise board yani masadaki herhangi bir şeyi yok ederek güç kazanıyorsunuz. Mananızı çok hızlı doldurabiliyorsunuz böylelikle çok sayıda spell kartlarından kullanabiliyorsunuz. Karşı tarafın oynunu bozmaya yönelik bir oynama stili var.

Elven Vengeance : Bu deck ile oynama zorluğu kolay. Elfler yani kartların özelliği hızlı olması o yüzden düşman size değil siz ona saldırıyorsunuz. Kombatı hızınızla yönetiyorsunuz.

Spectral Power : Oynama zorluğu zor olan bu deck için ise söylenebilecek şey çok rahat kart çekebilmeniz ve diğer aspectlerin kartlarına ulaşabilmeniz. Hızlı kart çekebildiğiniz gibi level / seviyede hızlı arttırıyorsunuz.

Angelic Legion : Oynama zorluğu kolay olan bu deck benim oyuna başladığım deck  oluyor. Kartları genellikle diğer kartlara ya da savaşçılarınıza güçlendirme veriyor. Ayrıca sizin karakterinize hp / can doldurabiliyor. Hasarınızı ve defansınızı arttırdığınızı düşünürsek meydandaki savaşçı kartlarınız daha uzun süre yaşıyor, hayatta kalıyor.

Udead Hordes : Oynama zorluğu orta. Rakibinizin kartlarını bozarak kendi kartlarınızı güçlendiriyor hatta can bile çekebiliyorsunuz. Diğerlerine göre hızları biraz yavaş fakat vuruşları çok daha güçlü.
GamePlay / Oynanış
Oyunumuz Spellweaver. Güzel ve ücretsiz bir kart oyunu. Diğer kart oyunları gibi bir deckiniz var ve burada 60 kart tutuyorsunuz. Kartlarınız  ise Shrines, Spells ve Creatures şeklinde ayrılıyor. Spell kartları boarda konmuyor. Genellikle tek kullanımlık kartlar oluyor. Kartın özelliğine göre kullanıyorsunuz ve atıyorsunuz. Creatures kartları ise sizin savaşçılarınız oluyor. Bu kartlarla defans ve saldırı yapıyorsunuz. Boarda koyuyorsunuz ve sırası geldiğinde hamle yapıyorsunuz. Yaptığınız hamle sonunda kart yok olmazsa hp / canı aldığı hasardan önceki haline doluyor.Shrines ise size level / seviye ve mana kazandırıyor.

Kombat biraz saçma geldi çünkü sizin 3/3 kartınız var rakibin 4/4 kartı var. Siz saldırdığınızda 4/1 kalıyor ve sizinki yok oluyor. Rakibinizinki boarda tekrar geri döndüğünde 4/4 oluyor ve sizin kartınız yok olduğu için o mücadeleden hiçbir şey kazanmamış oluyorsunuz.

Kartların özellikleri ise hız, saldırı, defans, level, mana.

Hız : Kartınızın hızı rakibinizden fazlaysa rakibiniz sizin hızlı olan kartınıza hasar veremiyor saldıramıyor. Hızı tamamen düşükse yani sıfırsa ozaman hiçbir yere saldıramıyor. Fakat bir ve üstündeyse rakibinizin Hero’suna saldırabiliyor.

Saldırı : Kartınızın vereceği hasar.

Defans : Kartınızın hitpointi yani canı. Can miktarı kadar ya da can miktarının üstünde hasar alırsa kartınız yok oluyor fakat can miktarından az hasar alırsa kartınız boarda geri dönüyor ve turn / sıra sonunda iyileşiyor.

Level : Kartlarınızın level / seviyesi var. Seviyeleri yüksek kartları kullanabilmeniz için shrine kartları ile seviye atlamalısınız. Shrine kartı kullandığınızda zaten size sorar seviye mi atlamak istiyorsunuz yoksa mana mı kazanmak istiyorsunuz şeklinde.

Mana : Kart kullanabilmek için mana değeriniz var. Elinizdeki mana değeri kadar kart kullanırsınız. Her tur sonunda mana değeri yenileniyor fakat artmıyor. Arttırmak için Shrine kartı kullanmalısınız.

 

Oyunda ayrıca kazandığınız altınlarla Deck satın alabiliyorsunuz. İçinden çıkan ve işinize yaramayacağını düşündüğünüz kartları ise parçalayarak yeni kart oluşturmak için malzeme oluşturuyorsunuz. Fakat bu işlemi ancak 300 karttan fazla kartınız olduğunda yapabiliyorsunuz.

Oyunda ayrıca görevler var ve bu görevler sonunda altın ve seviye kazanıyorsunuz. Accountunu seviye atladığında oyunun diğer özellikleri yani Ranked game gibi açılıyor.Ranked game de ise diğer oyuncularla dereceli müsabakaya katılıyorsunuz.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198169129262', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1552987311}
review:
Spellweaver is PVP card game. You play with other players and get rewards along the way. Leveling goes slowly but reward you with some new decks and unlocks challenges and trials. If you get to level 11 you can craft your own cards.
During my playtime I easily understood the basics, I won few fights and got few decks. 
For me this is pretty good card game, I think it is very rewarding, makes you play more and more.
There is micromanagement in the game, but you dont have to purchase anything, playing the game will reward you with in-game currency so you can buy and craft your own decks. Sure it is slow process but you dont have to spend real money.
I think this is o.k. game for card game and I do recommend it.

review:
Vamos a mais uma analise galerinha.
Pontos positivos.
Jogo é leve, praticamente roda até no celular.
boa jogabilidade, na verdade bem simples, mais simples ainda se fizer o tutorial.
Gráficos... digamos que 7/10, nada que já não tenhamos visto por ai.

Pontos negativos
Um jogo de cartas como outro qualquer se nada de diferente, literalmente um magic.
Fácil de se fazer combos de cartas que chega a ficar sem graça.
Poucos jogadores em PVP.
Jogabilidade simples chega a engessar o jogo.

Em resumo total dou nota 6/10
Bom para passar o tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268115996', 'num_games_owned': 1744, 'num_reviews': 389, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1547507163}
review:
Довольно, увлекательная настольная карточная игра со сказочными и фантази персонажами. Не плохой ход развития в плане стратегии и тактики - здесь она не предсказуема. Можно вмазать слабой картой так, что мало оппоненту не покажется, имея в наличии сильные стороны прокачки и её поддержки. 
Разбираться, почему такие смешанные обзоры на игру, не имеет смысла, так как терять финансово здесь нечего - игра в бесплатном доступе. Но есть и платные дополнения, поэтому советую просто вникнуть в обучающий контент игры, сыграть пару партий и делать свои выводы с тем стоит или нет вкладывать в игру свои кровные.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020579687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 6297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6267, 'last_played': 1496639481}
review:
A solid, free-to-play Magic: The Gathering clone that ultimately suffered the fate of all free-to-play games.

PROS:
Good artwork, if you like that style
Solid game mechanics
Better drop rates than Hearthstone
Actively updated

CONS:
$$$ is essential for good decks
Small community, long match queues
Boring singleplayer
More and more "premium" options
Often feels unbalanced
Requires a 3rd-party account to play

SUMMARY:
Spellweaver started out with a lot of promise. But the market for digital card games isn't huge, and the game didn't grow enough to justify it's free-to-play model. So the developers added more paywalls, making it harder for non-paying players to compete. Sadly, the new additions have killed off the playerbase and made building a decent deck very time-consuming. Making matters worse, Spellweaver's balance wasn't great to begin with. Losses often feel unavoidable because your deck was underpowered... and no amount of strategy would have changed the outcome. It's not a BAD game, but it doesn't have anything that makes it stand out. And there's no reason to play it unless you really need a MTG fix.

TL;DR:
This game is a flat average MTG-clone. It's art is worse than Magic, but it costs a lot less money to be competitive. It's tiny playerbase makes finding a match difficult. I recommend it only for people who truly LOVE card games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077996759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 75342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31252, 'last_played': 1644667755}
review:
The Good: It manages to implement a system not quite as complicated as MtG without feeling as horribly clunky as any of the online MtG versions. At this point the card pool also has become quite nice. Enough to enable many decks but not yet so many that newbies get lost. The speed system gives the game its own twist and the many card effects keep it interesting. Additionally the quest systems is quite generous, way more so than e.g. hearthstone.

The Bad: You could argue, that though the card art is nice, it doesnt have 3D art or lots of fancy spell particle effects, being an indie game and all that. And if 3 lines of text on a card is too much for you, you might have a bad time. Also, AI is not great.

The Ugly: Not enough players. Hopefully that changes with the China localization or else you can just invite all your friends xD (Waiting times for matches at the best of times is only about 30-60s but if you play when many people are sleeping, it can approach 10 min..)

Concerning the existing negative reviews: There arent any hackers. (Some card effects might make it seem as if you have more than 4 copies as with most card games oO) There are viable T1 control decks (Corruption mostly). Disconnections due to server issues are next to non-existent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064445776', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 164353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 380, 'playtime_at_review': 103265, 'last_played': 1712210356}
review:
I love this game but I'm not very good at it. It doesn't matter, it's addictive and fun. 
You see, I'm old and retired and missed many of the classic computer games because I worked so much, ironically as a programmer/analyst but I always kept an eye on the kids, and now grandkids, as they played in arcades and on their C64, consoles, and now laptops and phones. 

After retiring I started catching up on what I'd missed, mostly old rpgs that were cheap and could run on my pc, like Warlords. Lots of card games were free so I downloaded as many as I could. A few held my attention for awhile but I kept returning to Spellweaver
[list]
[*] timed turns
[*] beautiful artwork
[*] nothing overly animated or flashy enough to give me a headache
[*] good community
[*] free to a fault  
[*] addictive without being all consuming
[/list]

Give it a try, it's free. See if you don't keep playing to get more cards, Gold, and Crystals to feed your habit while having fun.

review: Spellweaver is a PvP game centred on card fights, featuring a slew of different creatures and monsters to do battle with. Monster cards will have HP, attack points dictating the damage they do, and a speed level which determines which cards they can attack. If your card has a speed rating of 2, and your opponent's is 4, your card is considered too slow to attack. These cards can fight amongst themselves, but to win the game, you need to deplete your opponent of their overall HP. Luckily, unlike something like Yu-Gi-Oh!, one need not get rid of the opponent's monsters first before attacking the opponent head on; which saves a lot of frustration as the combat between cards on the field can descend into long, drawn-out dogfights; the 45 minute time limit for games is indicative of this. However, that aside, the base formula for the game would seem like a gratifying card game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068982092', 'num_games_owned': 909, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 1625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1697415386}
review:
So this is not a game I expected to try.

It does so many unique things I never/rarely saw in card games before. First the attack scheme is very unique. Every one of your units can either target the opponent's face or directly target an ennemy unit and he can then block with his units that aren't already locked in combat. But the twist is that every unit has a speed value (from 0 to 4 from what I've seen). You can only target or block a unit with onw of equal speed or faster.
This means that you could build a "fast" deck. If your opponent doesn't have fast creatures too, you are pretty much unblockable. An other trick I saw often is that you can use a weaker creature to "pin" a strong blocker and send everything else to face. Since the blocker is engaged in combat, he won't be able to block your other creatures.

An other cool feature is the support zone. If you fear that a creature will get killed, you can move it back to your support zone. It won't be able to attack but it can't be attacked either.

"Land" cards give you either levels (which is your influence that determines which faction you can use) or one mana. If you choose the mana, it will either give you a hero skill (à la Hearthstone but you can have up to 3) or make you draw a card. Gaining mana doesn't give you a card disadvantage which give a lot more cards to play to everyone. There is also a mechanic to replace a card from your hand with a "land" from your deck. With all these factors combined, it is very rare to be mana screwed.

It also has ingame tournaments which is a very cool feature.

But it also has a couple of downsides. The UI is pretty damn awfull. Also, there aren't a lot of players (I'm position 650 at the bottom of the ranked ladder). I think the game is quite hard to get into. The tutoriel works backward. It asks you to do something and then explains it to you and I'm pretty sure it has you do bad plays at some point. Also, every single keyword works different than you're used to from MtG or Hs.

So overall, not the most promising game with the very little playerbase. I'd recommend classics like MtG, Eternal (or Hearthstone if you like that) over this but if you want at new twist on your card game, try this one. It's pretty good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009474997', 'num_games_owned': 2217, 'num_reviews': 1072, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 514, 'last_played': 1536900204}
review:
I used to play this one a lot, but not via the Steam App, i got it here but didn't get around to redoing or continuing it, too many card games these days i suppose, but that is not because this game sucks or isn't enjoyable, at the time of the release this really was one of the best card games digitally, not sure how it will hold up today, haven't really delved into many card games, they have become a bit too time consuming.

But with this title we have beautiful art and an amazing style to enjoy and behold, to roughly mention would be that this game has quite a few similar mechanics to how Magic the gathering would run, do note i haven't recently played the game again, a review is long over due.

To truly appreciate the game or to win a decent strategy is required and this game gives you that opportunity, there is a large quantity and options on deck building so you can truly explore and test until you find the perfect match for you.

a Card crafting system is featured in the game where you can break down cards you don't want and craft ones you do want so that is a nice extra feature here should you truly have bad RNG luck, the game however doesn't have too bad RNG mechanics to be concerned about.

Once you managed to get through the learning curve of this one i'm sure it is a game you can properly enjoy, the player base has taking a dip over the years though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027005470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 58565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53406, 'last_played': 1598353741}
review:
+No exclusive paid content, you can get everything through gameplay, even cosmetics
+Daily competitve tournaments, accesible via in-game inteface
+May be the only online TCG with draft mode where you keep the drafted cards
+Very balanced gameplay
+Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay
+Very strategic combat system
+Friendy to Magic: The Gathering players
+Diverse meta in competitive play due to good balance
+You can even get real money (if you win the Master's Championsip)
+Has phone version
+It runs in a toaster

-The phone version text can be hard to read in small screens
-The "end of turn" button is may be too close to the "divine offering button"
-In the phone version, the controls are not the best and more responsive, you can target the wrong thing or hit the wrong button or geting level from a shrine instead of mana by accident.

Overall is probably the best online TCG out there. I really can't say anything negative about the game mechanics or the developing team. If you like TCG and you are looking for somtheing more complex than Heartstone or Duelyst, this is your game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000111182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 31856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12569, 'last_played': 1585575963}
review:
J'ai tourné sur pas mal de TCG, et Spellweaver est à mon avis le 100% numérique qui réussit le mieux. Pour moi, les deux énormes points forts :
- Quêtes et levelling très généreux : on a vite beaucoup de cartes et le jeu n'est absolument pas Pay to Win par rapport à bien des autres...
- Zéro RNG. Zéro. Aucune carte n'a d'effet aléatoire. Un rêve devenu réalité ! De plus, la RNG pioche est largement réduite par les nombreuses options de pioche, à commencer par le système de mana qui fait lui-même piocher.

Viennent quelques autres qualités :
- Des développeurs soucieux de leur méta et qui nerfent sans y aller comme des bourrins (coucou Blizzard). Le deck control cataclysme / dragon ancestral a été nerf depuis que j'ai débuté le jeu, sans pour autant que chacune de ses cartes maîtresses ait été lapidée sur la place publique...
- Un game design sympa un peu mixé de Magic et d'HS. On retrouve la mana d'HS, les héros et leurs pouvoirs et la possibilité d'attaquer les créatures adverses, on retrouve un feeling global proche de Magic sur la complexité des cartes et des mécaniques, les couleurs avec les thèmes similaires si ce n'est qu'il y en a 6... Et le jeu a tout de même son identité, avec des mécaniques innovantes et personnelles : la vitesse des créatures, les esclaves, les deux lignes du board...
- Une interface claire, des pauses nécessaires mais fluides pour que l'adversaire puisse agir pendant votre tour suivant vos actions...
- Des tournois intégrés, et nombreux : qu'on y prenne part ou non, il y a de l'offre et toujours des actifs dessus ! Et c'est encore une occasion de gagner de belles récompenses sans débourser. Définitivement pas Pay to Win.

Bref, j'ai du mal à trouver quoi lui reprocher. Il n'a plus qu'à s'étoffer un peu en quantités de cartes afin d'augmenter les possibilités de decks, offrir une campagne pour les couleurs du Mal qui sont un peu en plan après "L'enfant saint" essentiellement centré sur le blanc, et j'espère vraiment un avenir radieux pour ce jeu qui le mérite pleinement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081921510', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 10038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5657, 'last_played': 1634258472}
review:
Türklerin yaptıkları yorumlara pek fazla bakmayın. Oyunu becerememişler ondan bu kadar başarısız yorumlar yapmayı becerebilmişler. Genellikle farklı bir steamden girdiğim için (aynı hesabı steamli steamsiz telefonda tablette farklı steamlerle kullanabiliyorsunuz aynı mail adresiyle) aslında 700 saat civarında olan oyun sürem 109 saat gözüküyor.

Oyun içinde nickim Xhite ocak ayında başladım nisandaki şampiyonaya katılmaya hak kazandım. Nisan liderlik sıralamasında 19. sıradayım. İlk 500de toplam 3 tane türk var. Ve sanırım ilk 100de bulunan tek türk benim. Kendimi acemi olarak görüyorum ama katıldığım turnuvalardan genellikle iyi dereceler elde edebiliyorum. (Conquest, Single elimination, Draft fark etmiyorum, triallarda da win ortalamam çok yüksek)

Önce oyunu anlatayım. Oyun magic the gathering in derli toplu düzgünve modern bir clientta toplanmış bazı mekanikleri geliştirilmiş hali olarak düşünebilirsiniz. Hearthstone a benzetilmekle beraber ben çok fazla benzerlik görmüyorum. Hearthstone gibi mana kendi kendine her tur artmıyor, tek bir sınıfa bağlı kalmak zorunda değilsiniz oyunda 6 farklı sınıf var ve istediğiniz gibi kombine edebiliyorsunuz kartları. Yaratıkların hızları var ve hızlı yaratıklar yavaş yaratıkları blocklayabiliyor ya da onlara saldırabiliyor ama yavaş yaratıklar hızlı yaratıklara tepki veremiyor. Savaş mekanikleri de oldukça farklı diyelim ki 4/4 yaratığa 2/2 ve 2/3 iki yaratıkla saldırıyorsunuz hearthstoneda ikisininde ölmesini beklersiniz ama burada ilk yaratık 2 hasarı emdiği için ikinci yaratık 1 canla hayatta kalıyor. Yine hearthstonedan farklı olarak yaratıklar her turun sonunda iyileşiyorlar. Farklılıklar saymakla bitmez, oyun kısacası hearthstonedan çok mtg ye benziyor.

Sizin ve rakibinizin başta 20 canı var ve başlarken 1 mananız var ama 1 mana ile hiçbirşey yapamıyorsunuz çünkü levelınız yok. (oyunda 6 tür var rage, dominion, corruption, order, wisdom, nature ) Oyunda shrinelar var (mtgdeki landlara biraz benziyor ama farklı) İlk başta shrine oynayarak başlıyorsunuz ve her tur maksimum bir tane shrine oynayabiliyorsunuz (ve mümkünse her tur oynamanız sizin için iyi) Sıradan shrineların iki görevi var ya ait olduğu türde level artıyorlar, ya da mananızı 1 arttırıp bir tane de kart çekmenizi sağlıyorlar. 1 order leveli ve 2 mana isteyen bir kartı oynamak için birinci tur bir order shrine ı ile level verip ikinci tur da herhangi bir shrine ile mananızı arttırmanız mantıklı.

Teoride istediğiniz kadar türden shrine ve kart koyabilirsiniz. Ama oyuna 7 kartla başlıyorsunuz ve her tur bir kart çekiyorsunuz. Elinize rage ve wisdom shrine ı gelir ama yaratıklarınız corruption ve wisdom büyülerinizde de nature ise muhtemelen birkaç tur hiç kart oynayamayacaksınız ve kaybedeceksiniz. Yani destede bütün türlerden kartları kullanmak kötü, genellikle iki tur seçip onları oynamanız gerekiyor.

Neden iki tür derseniz çünkü oyun o kadar güzel tasarlanmış ki bütün türler sadece tek bir konuda iyi ve eğer birden fazla türü aynı anda kullanırsanız destenizin eksiklerini azaltıyor. Ama çok fazla (3 bence fazla ama çok nadiren 3 tür kullanan desteler var) tür kullanırsanız desteniz tutarsız olucak ve bazı turlarda kart oynayamayıp dezacantajlı durumda olucaksınız.

Türlerin genel özelliklerinden bahsedersek. 
Order yani düzen destesi melekler, askerler ve şövalyelere sahip bir ırk. Özelliği bufflar (güçlendirmeler) Tahtadaki yaratıklarınızı çok daha güçlü yapacak kartları var. Aynı zamanda tahtadaki asker kartlarını bufflayan yaratıklar var ve bu sadece bu türde olan bir durum. 
Wisdom bilgelik destesi, makinalar üzerine olan bir ırk, donduran ya da şok uğratan büyü kartları var ve kart çekmek konusunda da iyiler. (şok bir yaratığın 1.5 tur boyunca herhangi birşey yapmasını engeller, dondurmanın doğrudan etkisi yoktur ama donmuş bir yaratık tekrar hasar alırsa kaç canı olursa olsun kesin ölür)
Nature yani doğa destesi elfler, ruhlar, bitkiler ve periler üzerine kurulu bir tür. Genellikle yaratıkları diğer türlere göre narin ama hızlıdır. Ayrıca bol bol uçan yaratıkları vardır. Büyüleri genellikle kendi kartlarını hızlandırmak, tek turluğuna güçlendirmek ya da rakibinin kartlarını eline geri göndermek üzerinedir. Yani doğa türünün büyüleri geçici etkiye sahiptir şartları değiştirir veya zaman kazanırlar.
Rage yani öfke türü saldırgan bir doğaya sahiptir, goblinler ve orclardan oluşur. Swift (yani çabuk) yaratıkları vardır tahtaya koyduğunuz anda saldırabilecek. Büyüleri doğrudan hasar verir diğer türlerin büyüleri doğrudan hasar vermemektedir.
Corruption yani yozlaşma türü zombiler ve iblisler üzerine kuruludr. Yaratıkları tahtaya girerken de ölürken de tehlikeli olabilir genellikle yavaştırlar ama bazıları zehirlidir. Ölmüş kartları diriltebilirler. Rakibin elindeki kartları atmasını ya da destesindeki kartlardan harcamasını sağlayabilirler. Büyüleri lanet üzerine kuruludur. Kimi lanetler rakip yaratıkları yavaşlatır. Kimi lanetler rakip büyü yaptıkça canının gitmesine neden olur.
Son olarak dominion yani egemenlik türü vampirler ve kölelerin türüdür. Zihni kontrol eden kartları vardır rakip yaratıkları ele geçirebilirler, rakibin destesinden kart çalabilirler suikastçileri varıdr bütün tahtayı yok edecek güçlü kartları vardır. Yaratıklara eklendiğinden güçlerini çok arttıracak makinaları vardır. Klon havuzları vardır ve oradan istedikleri kadar köle çıkarabilirler. Ama eğer tahtada köle olan yaratıkları köle olmayanlardan fazla olursa köleler isyan eder.

Oyun gördüğünüz gibi çok detaylı ve komplike bir oyun. Oyunu kurup bir kaç günde çözmeyi beklemeyin, yapay zeka çok güçlü değil başlarda yapay zekaya karşı pratik yapın sıkıcı gelene kadar. Sonra gerçek insanlarla savaşmaya başlayın, acımasız ve kurnaz olacaklardır. Ben ilk defa bir oyuncuyu yendiğim günü hala heyecanla hatırlıyorum. Hearthstoneda legend rankına ulaşmış birisi olarak bu oyuna başladığımda uzun süre sadece kaybettim. Yaptıkları şeyleri dikkatle izleyin ve öğrenin. Oyunu öğrendikçe zevki katlanacaktır.

Oyunun artı ve eksilerine ve şikayet edilen şeylere geçelim.

-Şikayet 1: Oyun çok buglı ve grafikleri kötü. Oyunun grafiklerinin güzel olduğunu düşünüyorum biraz alışmak gerekiyor. Çok buglı değil ama buglı genellikle yeni patchlerde yeni buglar geliyor. Çoğu bug kısa sürede gideriliyor. Oyunun zevkini kaçıracak derecede buglı değil ama bir kaç hafta oynayıp hiçbir buga rastlamazsanız inanmam.
-Şikayet 2: Oyun diğer oyunların çakması ve para kazanma amaçlı. %100 katılmıyorum. Diğer oyunların kopyası değil en güzel yanlarının kendine özgü bir şekilde sentezlendiği bir oyun ayrıca kendine özgü mekanikleri de var. Bu türdeki en bedava oyunlardan bir tanesi cebinizden bir kuruş harcamadan kısa bir sürede herşeye sahip olmanız mümkün. Ne kadar aktif ve başarılı olduğunuza bağlı tabi ben 3-4 ayda koleksiyonumu %95 tamamladım. Ama benim günlük gelirim ortalama bir oyuncunun 4-5 katı kadardır çünkü turnuvalarda oynuyorum ve kazanıyorum genellikle. Sadece görevleri yaparak bile bir senede koleksiyonu tamamlamak mümkün. Oyunda altınla alınamayan sadece hikaye kısmı ve kart arkaları ki kristali de para vermeden kazanmak zor da olsa mümkün.
-Şikayet 3: Kart çeşidi az. Evet kart çeşidi çok değil ama çok az da değil. Common, uncommon, rare, epic ve heroic nadirlikte kartlar var. 107 çeşit rare, 6 çeşit heroic kart var. Toplamda 400+ çeşit kart var. Ve yeni kartlar çıkacak mayıstan itibaren. Yapımcılar haziran ve temmuz dışındaki her ay 6-15 yeni kart çıkacağının sözünü verdiler. Mayıs ayında 7 farklı kart çıkacak ama sadece bir tanesi biliniyor.

Sonuç olarak oldukça derin ama keyifli, cebi yormayan zekayı ve strateji geliştiren bir oyun. Kesinlik çok zor ama olumsuz anlamda değil bu. Oyunu çok basit birşekilde oynamak mümkün ama her zaman yapılabilinecek daha iyi hamleler var. Magici saymazsak hiçbir rakibinde düzgün bir turnuva sistemi yok. Magicten 100 kat daha ucuz ve çok daha iyi bir arayüzü var. Oyuncu kitlesi yardımsever. %100 tavsiye ederim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198318597950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1814, 'last_played': 1546185160}
review:
Spellweaver is an extremely solid game. I'm a new player but a CCG veteran. For anyone looking for skill and decision based gameplay this is the game for you. The RNG is minimal, if not non-existent. The biggest thumbs up goes to the resource system. Its "land" based resources, but the core mechanics are beautifully designed and the dreaded "screw/flood" issue rarely ever affects the outcome of a game.

I've only been playing for about a month, since the release of the mobile client and have really enjoyed the entire new player experience. The starting package is decent and the game has starter quests and achievements to stack up your gold quickly. If you read up on how to spend you initial gold and crystals you can have a competitive Tier 1 deck almost out of the gate. I'm not completely F2P, I don't mind spending money on a game I enjoy to advance a little faster. But with minimal purchases of about $10.00 along with completing all my quests and dedicated rare drafting, In a month's time I now have three Tier 1 decks: 1 aggro, 1 midrange and 1 control.

The fastest route to a competitive deck is the Holy Child campaign. Spend your starting crystals on that, it's great value. If you're a control player, the Duke's Zombies DLC is a worthwhile purchase to give you a few of the key rares for Corruption control variants.

Other praise for the game:
- The game's mechanics, card interactions and overall design are excellent. The game borrows a lot from MTG, but has found very elegant ways to evolve the stack, land mana bases, and triggers. It's a complicated game, but much more streamlined than MTG.
- Balancing will always be tricky, but in general I haven't experienced anything super out of whack yet. There's a very rock-paper-scissors feel to the meta, and I've never felt like a complete underdog in any game. There are definitely bad matchups, but every game is worth playing out.
- The spectrum of competitive decks is wide open. Budget builds can often go toe-to-toe with expensive builds. Games I've played have been decided more by my knowledge of the cards and game and less about being blown out by something OP.
- Most of the meta decks probably need in the neighborhood of 8-12 rares. And key rares go in multiple archetypes, so it's really great for deck building and variety. Epic and heroic cards see play, but they're not essential to many decks nor do they dominate the meta.
- There’s a crafting system as well. Dusting cards isn’t super efficient, but as your collection grows it can help you fill in the last few missing rare/epic slots in your decks.
- The wait times are not bad at all. At peak times I can get a rank game in less than 30 seconds. Non-peak, maybe about 90 seconds.
- Games are usually between 5-20 minutes. Each player has a personal 15 minute timer, so the game will cap at 30 minutes.
- I personally love that there are NO EMOTES.
- I've never seen a tournament not fire. I've noticed a lot of familiar names, but whenever I've registered for a tournament it has always gone off.
- I haven't explored the tournament scene thoroughly yet, but it looks pretty good. Everything is in client. There are drafts, swiss, conquest and monthly championships (with a cash prize). There are even new player/low level only events, which you get 3 free tickets to try out when you make an account.
- The F2P model isn't stingy but not the most generous I've seen either. If you grind 100% F2P, it'll probably take 1-2 months to build a competitive aggro deck.
- The card pool is about 340~ish cards atm (I think), and they've just announced monthly small batches of new cards. So, it feels like a pretty good time to jump in and fill out your collection.
- For lore fans, there’s definitely a lot of it. I’m not a lore person myself, but the Holy Child campaign was very well thought out and the gameplay and lore tied in well together.

Some things I'm not thrilled about:
- There's definitely a steep learning curve. If you're brand new to CCGs and have no MTG experience, this game might be a bit unkind to you. You have to be well versed in timing, bluffing, hand reading, card counting, sequencing, knowing the cards, knowing the meta, key interactions and so on to really do well in this game. The losses will be many in the beginning for novice players.
- The community seems relatively small, but it’s not really a big issue. Everyone is really friendly and helpful. There are a few content creators pumping out stuff which I really appreciate, but it would be nice to have more analysis and high level gameplay footage.
- There's only one card that looks to be a bit OP and that's Jorail's Silencer. I've lost every game where that cards been played against me and I haven't found an effective counter yet. It's the only true "counterspell" in the game and it's a permanent. It essentially locks you out of the game once your control opponent stabilizes.

All in all, Spellweaver is a hidden gem. I can’t comment on the game when it launched (there seems to be some negativity about its initial release) however, the game I’ve experienced since mobile launch has been very satisfying. Well designed, skill-based, variety and F2P friendly. I strongly encourage any CCG fan to give it a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971698213', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2809, 'last_played': 1604071295}
review:
Bon TCG. Ancien jour qui y est revenu récemment, j'ai été agréablement surpris de voir que maintenant tous les decks étaient accessibles dès le début ce qui facilite grandement l'approche des différents thèmes et de leurs systèmes de jeu ...

Le craft vous permet de créer toutes les cartes du jeu à partir de vos rebuts, mais les plus rares seront bien évidemment très chères à créer. Le système de conversion est plutôt simple et, même s'il n'est pas très avantageux, à l'intérêt de pouvoir vraiment obtenir les cartes que l'on souhaite au final.

La notion de vitesse est à mon sens l'un des plus grands atouts de ce jeu, une statistique qui fait beaucoup de bien à l'intérêt stratégique des cartes, au delà de leur puissance brute.

Bref, pour ceux qui apprécient le genre, lancez vous ! 

Par contre, perceverrez un peu car les premières parties contre l'IA peuvent parraitre un peu ... désavantagées, surtout quand on découvre. Mais en mettant un peu le nez dans les decks de base, on peut se faire un deck tout à fait acceptable qui progressera rapidement avec les quêtes et leurs récompenses.

N'hésitez pas non plus à vous faire parainer, c'est 70000 or de gratis dès le début et ils vous seront très utiles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116879965', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 6897, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1712005936}
review:
Вы когда-нибудь слышали или говорили такую фразу, как "Не нравится? Иди и сделай свою игру."
Скорее всего да и не раз. Возможно, авторы Spellweaver (всего несколько человек - болгарский чемпион MTG, художник да пара программистов) тоже как-то услышали эту фразу в свой адрес. Но всё пошло не так, как обычно... Ибо они действительно сделали свою игру, доказав при этом, что клонировать механики других популярных игр без каких либо существенных изменений вовсе не обязательно. А заодно давно известную истину о том, что всё гениальное - просто.
Берём простоту, удобство и динамику Hearthstone. Убираем рандом. Добавляем тактическую глубину и знакомые механики из MTG. Стряхиваем в корзину десятки лишних фаз. Жгём напалмом ненавистные манаскрю и манафлуд. Осталось лишь добавить свою изюминку в виде скорости существ... Всё. Тортик готов. И единственная его проблема такая же, как и у любой хорошей вкусняшки - его мало. В данном случае, пока что мало карт и ещё меньше игроков. Но и то и другое поправимо со временем.
Может это и не лучшая ККИ всех времён (если смотреть объективно и на данный момент), но шансы стать ею однажды определёно есть.

Это была объективная часть.

10/10 !!! Это шедевр !!!

Это была субъективная часть.

P.S. Перевод на великий в марте-апреле.
P.P.S. Графика, звук и прочее на вкус и цвет... все дела.
Но во-первых, это инди (не ждите чудес).
Во-вторых, разработчики выложились на максимум. И так как это не наши чиновники. Все деньги были потрачены так, что игра выглядит и играется достойно. Глаза не кровоточат, баги не достают, разве что новые звуки немного не в тему. Но думаю поправят.
P.P.P.S. Про самое важное забыл - донат. Игра буквально заставляет искать вас причины задонатить. Ну в том плане, что я хотел помочь разработчикам, но и для себя что-то получить... И в итоге, пришлось просто задонатить, ибо по совести - они это заслужили. А так смысла в донате пока что нет. Всё и без того доступно. Даже на рубашки карт можно насобирать кристаллов в игре, хоть и не быстро. Как бы они не обанкротились с такой политикой...

10 из 10
