author: {'steamid': '76561198057220699', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 70531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40032, 'last_played': 1588453647}
review:
I absolutely love this game. And after i have spent ~700 hours in the game and released about 191 videos on YouTube, i decided it is time to share my opinion about the game.

For everyone who wants a quick rundown on what Spellweaver is;
Spellweaver is a collectible trading card game that takes inspirations from various other trading card games and mixes in some unique gameplay elements.

Many compare it to a mixture between magic and hearthstone. Can't say much about latter, since i have never played hearthstone, but i can see the resemblance to magic, not only in terms of some of the artwork.

So far i have spent roughly 700 hours in this game. The learning curve the game provides is noticable and u can see improvements in the way you play fairly early on.

Another noteworthy point is that the player base is rather small (with a good spike lately due to the android release) which i definitely enjoy, because the community in this game is healthy, friendly and the distance between pro players and new comers is bascially non existent. You can just add some pro players to your friendlist, ask them for advice on how to improve your game, how certain cards work, what cards work well in conjunction with other cards. Honestly, the community is super friendly when it comes to helping new players out.

It's also really easy to gain the cards you want. There are tournaments being held every day. Simply by participating u can earn gold, which u can spent on booster packs or premium packs to emassen your card collection. In addition u also unlock quest points on the main hub, that give u either booster packs, additional gold or certain cards, so getting a good amount of cards right from the start isn't really that hard to accomplish.

Last note i'd like to make, is that i started creating videos on YouTube following my advances (and falls) in Spellweaver Ranked, as well as tournaments that i participate in.
So if u have played Spellweaver for a while, if u have emassed a good amount of cards and need some ideas for some decks, feel free to check out some of my videos. Maybe the more recent ones on the bottom ;)
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLe6SB4e9VpR7hwUq43xiNOx9sdh6sXIEQ

All in all, Spellweaver is the first card game that i've played competitively and i have enjoyed it ever since i picked it up. There are a good number of cards and even when there weren't any new cards included, the player base still created some amazing decks with synergies no one has thought about before. It's really stunning to see with what types of decks people come up with. Now, with the mobile release, it's a good time to start playing spellweaver, because of the huge amounts of new cards the developers are gonna unleash on us, which in turn, means more varieties of decks, more fun interactions between the cards and just way more content for established and newer players to discover.

TL;DR: Best card game i have ever played. I highly recommend it =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198104829683', 'num_games_owned': 1497, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 1349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1349, 'last_played': 1514207747}
review:
Luego de 22 horas, creo que puedo dar una opinion, el juego a veces es muy divertido, pero la gran mayoría de veces es frustrante, por lo menos para mi que soy jugador casual de juegos de cartas, uso estos juego cuando la pc esta  ocupada haciendo algo en segundo plano antivirus, comprimiendo, etc...


         las mecanica del juego es compleja, no es sencilla para jugadores casuales como yo,  ya que debes estar pendiente cierto valor de velocidad, puedes tener mas ataque que tu enemigo pero si este tiene más velocidad no puedes atacarlo. otra cosa que veo es que cada día esta más desbalanceado, despues de mucho tiempo decidi jugar una partida mientras mi pc termina con una tarea. coloque una partida en facil ya que llevo meses sin entrar a el. y cual es mi sorpresa, la pc coloca la raza vampiro y cuando estamos ya en el 3 turno, saca 3 cartas de hechizo y su esbirro tiene vida de 8 y ataque de 6, sin contar que tiene unas cartas que tiene un poder llamado letal que tan solo al atacar estas cartas mueres, a menos que ataques a distancia. en fin como digo yo soy noob en estos juegos de cartas, solo jugue en el pasado yugioh psx1 y heartstone (aun jugado a ratos al dia) y el the wicther (cartas gwen).

     Conclusión para jugadores casuales o muy novatos, no es recomendado por sus mecanicas complejas, ya luego de 22 horas creo que esta bien de oportunidades. el mejor consejo que puedo darte es pruebalo por ti mismo, ya que se ve interesante y si lo dominas pues te gustara. y sus gráficos (arte se ve muy bonito).


PD: No tiene un sistema de armado de mazos automatico, algo como blizzard que colocas el heroe y das listo y el te arma un mazo automatico con las cartas que tienes,  el cual es bastante bueno, la pc arma mejores mazos que yo xD

suerte.

review:
За игрой слежу со времен беты …но к сожаление как бы я не был лоялен  к инди разработчикам но всеже пришло время отписатся поскольку игра уже вышла из яслей ЗБТ.

review:
Вы любите ККИ, любите продумывать свой ход и придумывать интересные комбинации? Но при этом не обладаете скоростью реакции эльфа? (Вас, как и меня, тоже бесит слишком маленькая длительность хода в большинстве современных ККИ?) Тогда вам сюда!
В Spellweaver, как в хороших шахматах, есть лимит только на общее время ваших ходов. И это 45 минут! Хватит, чтобы при 20 очках жизней у оппонента продумать выигрышную комбинацию на каждый свой ход.

Добро пожаловать в Spellweaver, друзья!

author: {'steamid': '76561198061743875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 12422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12180, 'last_played': 1560173721}
review:
Before I get into why I have given this a negative review, let me just say that the core gameplay is solid. I like the mission system they have going on, and the cards are cool and (for the most part) balanced. If you enjoy TCG's (If you dont why are you even reading this? :P) you will almost certinatly get a good few hours out of this game, unlocking new cards and seeing a visible increase in your power. If your looking for something to play on the side, this could well be the game for you. And hey, its free, so dont just take my words for it, go and give it a try yourself, you have literally nothing to loose. 

-------

Unfortunatly I dont think this game is really worth the time anymore. As someone with limited funds this was a great TCG with some interesting mechanics, and (imo) none of the cheese that Hearthstone has. 

That is still the case, however the rate at which you earn in-game money (to buy new packs) has become so incredably slow that in order to compete you will have to open your wallet every time a new batch of cards comes along just to stay competative, and even then the random nature of TCG packs means even if you spend money, your not guarenteed the cards your actually looking for. The way around this is to buy Premium Packs which guarentee you copies of cards you dont yet have a playset (4 copies) for. At lower levels they are basically money down the drain compared to regular packs, at higher levels/when you have most cards it seems to me that the only real way to get the cards your looking for is to buy those packs. 
That being said, there is a crafting system of sorts where you can dissasemble cards you dont want/already have a playset  of in order to earn "Mana" cards, which you can then spend on unlocking cards you need. Great system in all honesty, but it all comes down to the grind, which is simply no fun. The prices for the higher tier cards are quite simply rediculous. 

The new cards added feel... well... cheaty(?) compared to the old and in general not incredably well balenced, this leads to even the AI roflstomping your until-2-days-ago pretty sweet deck youve spent ages crafting into oblivion. Not to mention the unlockable heros being rediculously overpowered compared to the free starter ones. Adding in the Hero Packs was and is a brilliant idea, but again, they cost far to much for what you earn in-game.

The mission system is good, like I said in the beginning, but again, rewards are far to low to really make them worth doing anymore.

At its core I do NOT feel that this is a p2w game, but at higher levels it seems to be slipping in that direction. 
All TCG's have a p2w element, which I think everybody expects before even getting into them, and I have taken that into account but its got to the point where I feel im being pushed to pay rather than play, and thats no fun. 

After 200 hours in the game this is one that im going to have to leave to the side and only play on occasion if im bored. Its a huge shame, if they up the rewards for matches then maybe I will get back into it, but for now, its a no, and that makes me sad :(

author: {'steamid': '76561198132909935', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2085, 'last_played': 1638074372}
review:
为啥说是万智牌？明明阵营个数都不一样。

这是炉石和英雄无敌的孩子，谢谢。还借鉴了一点魔法门——英雄冲突的思路，即，引入了速度的概念。
六大阵营，显而易见是可以和英雄无敌对应——秩序对应圣堂（特征生物为天使+人类，或者说西方人类），睿智对应学院（特征生物为东方神话生物+东方人类），自然对应森林（特征生物为精灵）；愤怒对应堡垒（注意不是深渊，特征生物为地精），堕落对应亡灵（特征生物，各种不死族），主宰对应地下城（特征生物，暗精灵，甚至有特征魔法，大灾变，即末日审判）。
而且啊，兄弟们，颜色都一样！主色调，分别是黄色蓝色绿色红色深绿紫色。
一点点的相似并不怎么样，相似如此之多，只能说是亲生儿子。

跟炉石的相似性就不说了。

另外最近玩的人略少，三分钟没有匹配到人，有点尴尬。

但是还是很好玩！就算是亲儿子，也是既长得像爸爸，又长得像妈妈的游戏啦哈哈

review:
Я переиграл во многие ККИ: Мтг, Heartstone, Берсерк, Hex, Shadowverse, Faeria, Гвинт, Infinity wars, Duelist, Duels of Champions, Klanz, Urban rival, Star Crusade. На данный момент считаю Spellweaver ЛУЧШЕЙ ККИ из существующих.
Гениальная и в то же время протая механика, требующая куда большего продумывания, чем в хартстоуне или мтг. Ненавязчивый донат: даже из стартовых карт, с добвлением некоторых комонок и анкомонок можно составить очень крутую колоду, способную занимать места на турнирах.
Главная проблема: мало игроков.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208139256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 29820, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19534, 'last_played': 1573120054}
review:
Interesting game design, involving everything from the standard Strength/Toughness/Mana Cost (for you M:TG afficianados) to differences in creature speeds.  Interface is fairly straightforward, card designs are relatively balanced (although, like most CCG's there are a few combos that you might as well scoop against when you see them played).  PvP is ok, but like most games you're sort of at the mercy of how many players are online AND the quality of their sportsmanship (referring to decks clearly designed for competitive play being used against new players strictly looking to get started.  You'll see what I mean.)  Other than that, it's a game I thoroughly enjoy.

Overall, I give it a 4/5 (and am looking forward to continued expansions).

author: {'steamid': '76561197996758444', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 60037, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13160, 'last_played': 1704336556}
review:
It's another CCG like magic the gathering, but unlike magic, this one has some minor differences like creature speed (slower creatures can't block faster ones etc.) and creatures can attack other creatures. The mechanics are what you'd expect more or less with a few added twists here and there.

The best feature has to be the mana system. Every card has a mana cost and an aspect level cost. With mana cards you can either get a level in the aspect or +1 mana and +1 card. If you don't have a mana card in your hand, you can shuffle an unwanted card into your library and get a mana card if it's in the first five top cards. This makes the game way less dependant on luck, and you almost never get mana screwed. 

The art style is great, each aspect has their own unique mechanics and creature types, and there are of course fun decks to build by mixing them. The graphics are a bit bare bones, the effects cards make are nothing special, and there's only one battlefield, but it's fine.

The best reason to play this game is it's free to play model. There's a map screen with quests like, play 3 games, win 5 games, gain X fame, beat an obnoxiously difficult AI opponent, etc. You have to unlock the questing site first (this serves as a form of a tutorial, you have to play with decks of a certain aspect in order to unlock the quest site). After that's done, every day you can choose one of few quests to do with rewards like gold, uncommon cards, foil cards, rate cards, trial tickets, and even premium currency. And the you even get boosters and hero packs for free when you level up along with gold. They really shower you with gifts, and I have pretty much every card released for free just by paying the game.

Multilayer is also cool with trials (draft) and tournaments every day.  

There's nothing in the premium currency shop that you can't get by just playing except card backs which don't impact the gameplay. Premium currency is just to sued things up if you want, but getting cards is already fast and if you need specific cards you can craft them, and covert excess copies of cards into crafting material (and you craft cards with mana shrines).

You'll never feel obligated to buy something to progress, even without spending any money it's possible to win multiplayer.

The only thing you have to pay for if you want access to it is the single player campaign. But you get tons of cards from it so you still don't lose anything should you choose to buy it, you're basically buying cards with it along with the experience.

All in all a pretty generous game with fun mechanics. Nothing groundbreaking, but has a nice active community and fun gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974878314', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5902, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5630, 'last_played': 1514332656}

Ik blijf dit spel spelen, omdat het leuk blijft, tegelijkertijd uitdagend en de potjes duren niet langer dan 10 minuten, heel af en toe 15 minuten.
De speciale effecten zijn voldoende, zonder dat het beeld er mee overspoeld wordt.

Ik zou zeggen, roep mij een keertje voor een potje te spelen of voor vragen en verdere uitleg!

review:
Free to suffer card game with INNOVATIVE mechanics(complication level 5/5 ). 75 hours of humiliation in all ways possiable. Have't had any single pleasure from this game. I will keep trying to build my deck in next 75 hours....

So.. after some more hours of game play I manage to a acquire some cards and build a deck which make me won couple ranked games.
….still getting used to games mechanics as attacking enemy 2 ATT 2 HP with 1 ATT 1 HP + 1ATT (range) 1 HP get my range attacker kill beside enemy HP is 0 as range is acting first. Some other flaws are visible. Another, I call it issue, is when defending creature cannot be add to already attacked one or attacked one cannot be withdraw to defend other position. Such innovations are easily to get used to as eating a soup with a fork. 
In replay to voices heard. I will give it thumbs up but with a warning to a new starters… DoC and HS was much easier to begin with. Game is enjoyable as you have open possibility to mix heroes skills with theirs field of expertise. Mixture of cards that don’t have to be assigned to one heroes allows you to find your OWN way to play. I made ZOMBIES to FLY on PEGASUS!!!
...130 hours still didn't catch up on any regular players....most heroes are usless as you will find out (nobody plays them)

review:
面白い
MtGのようにメインフェイズが2つあったり、相手の攻撃時に時間を止めて持ちマナとカードで対処したりできる
また、基本土地にはドロー効果が付いてたり、また1ターンに1度任意の手札1枚を土地と交換できる可能性もあるので、土地少ない事故にはなりにくい(土地多い事故にはなる)
その反面、お互いに展開が早いのでそれに合わせた戦略が必要

そして何よりも独自の生物スピードシステムが面白く、スピードを合わせないと(上位有利)反撃できなかったりして、ゲームに深みを与えている

反対に駄目な点は、人が少なすぎてゲーム内の大会最低人数に達しないことがままあること(その場合は没収試合)
1戦のみのQuickゲームでも平均1分は待たされる

author: {'steamid': '76561198239363434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1497766663}
review:
Incroyablement déséquilibré. Au début, il n'y a qu'un seul champion disponible, et donc un seul type de cartes (liés au champion en quelque sorte)... et sans mentir : c'est de la merde. 

- La différence de difficulté entre l'IA facile/moyen/difficile est inexistante (ça se joue à la chance).
- Les VS amicaux avec d'autres joueurs sont hyper déséquilibrés. C'est bien simple : aucune chance de construire son jeu avec le deck de base, les autres démontent toutes les stratégies possibles et on finit à poil au bout de 5 minutes.
- Communauté inexistante : en 20 matchs j'ai dû croiser 7 joueurs en boucle (et pas DU TOUT de mon niveau).

Même Earthstone à côté m'a paru beaucoup mieux sur l'équilibrage et la diversité des champions à bas niveau. Ici on est clairement dans du pay-to-win. 
Et le style graphique ça reste une question de goût, mais je le trouve trop grossier et fade.

Je ne recommande pas ce jeu que je trouve incroyablement frustrant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056326988', 'num_games_owned': 3846, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 15663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9982, 'last_played': 1709419593}
review:
[h1]Начал играть я почти с самого выхода игры.[/h1] В то время раздавали два кода, при активации которых ты получал несколько колод.
Начало было очень хорошее. Простые правила, похожа на МТГ, бесплатная. Easy to learn hard to master.

[list]
[*]6 типов земель, у каждой по 3 героя с уникальным умением и возможностью добрать 2 общих умения.
[*]Возможность расплыть ненужные и крафтить нужные карты.
[*]Битва с ботами, за которые дают НОРМАЛЬНЫЕ награды.
[*]Ежедневные задания с нормальной наградой.
[*]ПвП, где противник находился за 20 секунд.
[/list]
[b]- В итоге отличная игра, на которую не жалко потратить время.[/b]

Но через некоторое время выходит патч-ребаланс, который многие карты режет в край(читай го*но). Хотя надо отдать должно - все те, кто скрафтил эти карты за неделю до этого, могли вернуть полную цену крафта. Но моя пятая точка сгорела и я ливнул.

И вот прошел год.
Что же изменилось?
На сервреах не осталось живого народу.
За 5 минут поиска в режиме испытания игра не нашла мне соперника(а сейчас у меня 2 из 3 задания связано с Испытанием. При чем там надо пройти 3(!) и 4(!) полных испытания! Это минимум 9 и 12 боев соответственно).
В обычных боях дела обстоят получше - иногда находится соперник, а если нет, то через 45 секунд тебя выпускают против бота.
Наверное вы уже догодались, что в рейтинге все очень х*ево?

Эта игра - наглядный пример того, как про*бать все полимеры.
Стоит ли покупать ДЛЦ или паки? - Нет, не стоит. Лучше купите трилогию первого Spellforce.
Стоит ли играть в эту игру? - Возможно. Игра не плоха. А если вы когда-то решите сделать свою ККИ, то можно "одолжить" пару механик.
[u]_                                             _[/u]
Отдельно хотелось бы обосра..обозреть режим Турнир.
Стоимость входа - 1 билет(17.500 золота) и 3 бустер пакака.
Максимальная награда - 17,500 золота + 1.500 за участие + карты, выпавшие из паков.
Вы видите выгоду от участия в турнире? Я вижу несколько вариантов:
[list]
[*]Вы составляете боеспособную колоду, побеждаете, получаете обратно 17.500 золота и выбранные вами карты + НАГРАДУ в виде 1.500 золота.
[*]Вы выбираете наиболее ценные карты из предложенных, но сливаете турнир.
[/list]
А теперь о самом сладком:
[list]
[*]Так как играет мало людей, то в турнире может быть только 5 человек.
[*]Для получения 17.500 золота можно проиграть только ОДИН раз
[*]Против вас будут играть задроты(возможно из ТОП10).
[/list]
Дабы не быть голословным - буквально за 10 минут до написания этих строк был набор на турнир. Туда записались: 58 уровень(топ10), 45, 15 и 9(с этим я раз 5 подряд сталкивался в обычных битвах).
Даже при оптимистичном раскладе можно получить 3/4, а если уж реально смотреть на вещи, то даже 2/4 под вопросом.
[u]_                                             _[/u]
Если вы все же решили попробовать эту игру, то [h1]реферальный[/h1] код [h1]NJAVWY[/h1]. Хотя можете взять любой другой из обсуждений Steam.
Реферальный код делает следующее:
[list]
[*]Вы получите 75,000 золота.
[*]Я получу 10,000 золота за каждые 5 ваших уровней.
[*]Я получу 10% от вашего внутриигрового доната.(Хотя я и не советую этого делать, но если все же будите - выменяю Steam коллекционные карточки.
[/list]
В качестве некоторого стимула могу помочь новичкам советом(skype - shramoo). А при получении вами 10 уровня отдам 1 внутриигроковой ключ со старой раздачи([b]хотя он может уже не работать![/b]).

Небольшой совет\предложения разрабам по поводу ПвЕ - добавить режим Загадки(как в МТГ), где надо взять управление над героем в середине битвы и победить врага\выстоять в течении одного хода. И каждые N-дней задание меняется.

PS. Ну как, игра удалась, верно?
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1097126329

review:
Devo dire che rispetto agli altri giochi di carte, spellweaver mi ha fatto ritornare dopo un pò di tempo.

Pro: 
1)Quest giornaliere (3 al giorno) 2 di mattina ed 1 alle 16:00 . Le quest si possono scegliere. Le quest hanno varie rarità da comune ,non comune,rara ed epica.C'e anche 1 quest che si può fare ogni 3 giorni che da buone ricompese

review:
垃圾中的垃圾，号称是万智的继承者，人家还没死呢你就把大旗立起来了，简直是开群嘲光环。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066945741', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 5428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4557, 'last_played': 1507638043}
review:
Fun game, sometimes things are a bit complicated or difficult to understand why something happened or why something was possible. As a Magic the Gathering player, I find a lot of the mechanics very similar to MtG mechanics, but that isn't necessarily a bad thing. There're enough differences between MtG and Spellweaver to be confidant in saying that this game isn't a MtG rip-off. Online matchmaking can take a while. 

The game can be played without paying real money, but the grind is real. You can only have a max 4 copies of a card in a deck, but you can collect more than 4 copies in your collection. When you buy a booster pack, you get random cards and you have a chance of getting cards of which you already own 4 copies of. You can disassemble these cards for shrines, which in return you can use to craft other "new" cards, but it's not on a 1-for-1 ratio. It's more like a 4-for-1. I haven't made a single in-game purchase with real money yet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086614934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 19905, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16318, 'last_played': 1611594116}
review:
Spellweaver could be defined as the prodigial son of Magic: the gathering and Hearthstone. It features their best aspects in one game, and some of its own. It also features 10 different  languages

The best part of this game are it's game modes. You get to play against your friends, normal games, ranked games, trials (like HS arenas), regular scheluded tournaments and draft tournaments, master series preclasification tournaments and if you are good enough to win those or rank top 10, you get to play in the monthly master series. Also, it recently added a campain in which you get a lot excelent cards and play very challenging matches.

This game is not P2W at all. You get quests every 8 hours, where you can choose between 1 to 4 different quests of different rarities which will make it harder or easier but the reward will match that. Also, you may have 6 active quests at the time and get a 7th special quest every 3 days. This game is SO rewarding. I haven't spent a single dollar and I own a complete collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151688047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 17839, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7555, 'last_played': 1558746901}
review:
If you are looking for a alternative less buggy version of MTG to play online then this is best thing I have found so far.

Some Pros:
   - Updates Pretty Frequently (Playable Campaign was just released, Balancing Cards)
   - Doesn't Crash That Often
   - Cannot 'Buy' Singles (Except the Heros but I'm fine with that)
   - The Cards Actually Work
   
Some Cons:
   - Pay for the Campaign
   - Level Disparity in Some Tournaments
   - Cannot Buy Singles
   - Not a Lot of Card Variety

Yes, I know I put buying singles up there twice. I like it but I dislike it at the same time. It stops people from buying the best deck playing with that and getting board of the game and leaving. It forces people to create decks and be more creative. It stops people from being to OP. BUT if someone or something is OP and not in range of a ban hammer then you lose. BUT those are few and very far between. 

The Rules that are set up make the game go quickly: the timers, the phases, the helpful aides, and the complete lack of energy destruction.

I wish there was more variety but I understand there not being so much for the game beingg so young. I am happy to see the progression, but a little miffed at the pay wall for the story campaign, but again I understand: money doesn't grow on trees. 

Finally,I am excited for the future of this game and will wait patiently with an empty wallet.

Omnomnom

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2465, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1490361975}
review:
카드 대전 게임.

자신만의 덱을 구성하여 대전을 합니다.
자원 카드/ 몬스터 카드/ 영웅 카드/ 스킬 카드 4종류가 존재합니다.

자원 카드의 경우, 레벨 또는 마나의 상승에 사용됩니다.
레벨을 올리면 해당 소속의 카드를 소환할 수 있죠. 물론 동일하거나 레벨이 낮은 경우.
마나의 경우에는 카드 소환과 특수 능력, 스킬의 사용에 소모됩니다.
자원 카드로 최대치를 상승시키며, 매 턴 FULL로 회복됩니다.

몬스터 카드는 대전에서 전투를 담당하는 카드입니다.
소속의 레벨에 맞춰야 소환이 가능하며, 마나를 소모합니다.
체력과 공격력을 가지고 적 몬스터와 전투를 하거나 플레이어에게 직접적인 공격이 가능합니다.
속도라는 것이 있으며, 이 속도를 서로 비교하여 전투를 실행하거나 방어할 수 있습니다.
쉽게, 속도 1인 몬스터는 속도 2이상의 몬스터에게 싸움을 걸 수 없으며,
속도 2이상의 몬스터가 플레이어를 공격하려고해도 방어할 수 없습니다.
동일하거나 자신보다 낮은 속도의 몬스터에게만 반응할 수 있습니다.

스킬 카드는 다양한 효과를 지닌 카드입니다.
어떻게 사용하느냐에 따라서 전황을 뒤집을 수도?


아쉬운 점
-역시 카드는 비싸더라
-덱 구성 시, 덱에 포함되지 않은 카드 구별하기가 힘듬/ 아래에 표시는 되지만, 따로 해당 카드만 표시하기는 없음
-서버가 중간중간 끊기는 경우 있음/ 다행이라면 게임 상황(전투)는 유지

author: {'steamid': '76561198242079956', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5532, 'last_played': 1572755470}
review:
值得一玩的TCG游戏
优点：
1 复杂度介于炉石和万智牌之间，不像炉石那么无脑，也不像万智牌那样繁杂。适合各路嫌弃炉石的无脑和氪金，又不喜万智牌套路过深的玩家
2 地牌机制自带抽卡，相比万智牌好很多，因为等级概念的加入，又比炉石每回合的固定涨水晶的机制来得灵活。
3 虽然游戏的内购很贵，但实际上不用花什么钱也能在较短时间内集齐大部分所需要的卡（得益于相较于万智牌浅很多的牌库，以及游戏内相当良心的任务机制）。当然，如果愿意花钱，各类优惠力度很大的活动也在等着你。
4 任务机制真的很赞，此外还有每天不断的各类锦标赛、轮抽赛，可以让玩家快速获得众多金币和卡牌。
缺点：
1 各类颜色的特点很不清晰（可见在卡牌的设计上和万智牌是有差距的），实力也很不均衡。不过卡组和万智牌一样可以混色，并不像炉石一样只能固定某个阵营。
2 卡牌的插画感觉很一般，来自万智牌的看脸党可能很难不去吐槽。不过如果你能忍受炉石，那这个你基本也可以接受吧（虽然炉石似乎一直被称赞“卡牌设计精美”......不过它明明就是音效和游戏画面好点吧←_←）
3 游戏分辨率比较低，不过1个G的游戏你奢望多少呢？

关于网络，评测里不少人吐槽过，并因此给了差评。不过我个人感觉自从某次更新后还挺不错的。裸连无压力，偶见掉线。偶尔服务器会抽（多半是快有更新的时候），掉线掉个不停，那就过天再玩。

总结：良心TCG，你值得拥有！

又及：游戏自带全汉化

author: {'steamid': '76561198210431069', 'num_games_owned': 898, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 40069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39645, 'last_played': 1550361818}
review:
I used to play the game but i decided to change my review from positive to negative.
The reasons are simple.
1)Developers have reduced the 2.000 dollar prize to mere 250 dollar.
2)The game doesnt have enough answers if combo decks like purple/blue plays the 4 5/5 flying drake he will start combo you until you are dead.Yes you pay 4 mana to do 5 damage but the problem is basic despina herself and the lack of game mechanic.When Drake's effect activates the game doesnt let you to answer against this combo and it started to get annoying.
3)lack of balance of some cards.Ghoul 3/3 was a fking example altough they did nerf it but after begging them for months.
4) and last reason i quitted is because cards like Grand Reunion and Skatador's binding simply they cant be removed because the game has very lower number of  removing spells from the field.Grand Reunion is most of times an auto win card.I hate when games dont have enough answers.Thats what mostly made me quit it.I hope they do better and learn the lesson because having no fking removals,having no fking answers against threats it turns the game to being toxic and being unfun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094028077', 'num_games_owned': 265, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 9039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4468, 'last_played': 1522843740}
review:
游戏类似万智牌，个人非常喜欢。比炉石要有趣一些，难度在万智牌之下。目前玩了大概70多个小时，还准备玩下去。
先说说优点和特色：
1、有合成，可以合成自己需要的卡。
2、可以像万智牌一样混色组合，有地牌，各种战术要比炉石有趣。
3、比起万智牌加入了速度的设定，比较新鲜。
4、有每日任务，任务随机，可以打AI赚钱和声望（经验）
5、有单局轮抽、大师赛、试炼等不同的模式。单局轮抽可以将抽到的卡牌带出去。

再说说缺点
1、听说更新很慢，新卡出的速度很慢。
2、平衡度一般，有些组合特别强势。
3、玩的人比较少，有时候友谊赛只能打AI（40来秒匹配不到人就会自动打AI，得的奖励还是友谊赛的奖励）

author: {'steamid': '76561198030377849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 4237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3943, 'last_played': 1494871940}
review:
I give this game something between good and bad. The mechanism is similar to MTG but better adapted for online. The art is very good and the game mechanism is mostly well developed, but the game is very inbalance and strategies are very rigid. I am playing several good CCG games and on this one it quickly become uninteresting and somewhat monotonous. 

Most matches are decided by a single card that the opponent or you can do nothing to counter. Also, by knowing what strategy you have and the opponent have you can guest know who is going to win, no matter the luck or how hard you play. There is no much strategy, besides the deck building, and winning decks are hevily based on golden cards. 

Some mechanism are confusing, like flying, or blocking. Same as MTG, lands are drawn from the deck. They tried to correct the luck factor with some weird mechanism, but it would be much better if players can freely choose how to manage the mana. 

The game has a lot of potential, but it need sharpness and balance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198205141660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 8856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3702, 'last_played': 1570476639}
review:
Well well well… first of all, I wanna apologize if my English is not the best. I’m still learning…

ABOUT SPELLWEAVER:
OK, first thing first, I wanna say that normally I don’t write reviews, but for this time I wanna make an exception. This for try to help the title that I personally think IS GOOD.

NICE GAME, BRILLIANT, BALANCED and IT’S a REAL FREE TO PLAY (NOT A PAY TO WIN)

- NOW I'LL START THE REAL REVIEW AND IF U HAVE ANY QUESTION, I CAN ANSWER U WITHOUT ANY PROBLEM :)
I HOPE THIS WILL HELP U! -

-

Personally, I found this game really nice and interesting with good potential.
Obviously, it is a little bit similar to others famous TCG, but is even true that Spellweaver has something particular and personal. Surely this is a game that can “grow” further, but honestly I think it has not a lot to envy compared to others TCG Free to play.

HERE THERE ARE MY MOTIVATIONS:

1)SIMPLE AND FUNNY BUT NOT BANAL AND BORING.
The game in itself is simple but not banal, easy to play for everyone but reserve anyway moments where is necessary to think a lot about what decision to make or the strategy u wanna adopt during matches.
Basics of this game are easy to understand and it is possible to learn mechanics after just few time of game experience. BTW, to become an expert and great players is necessary to invest time and make some practice.

2)WELL BALANCED, GOOD OPPORTUNITIES TO WIN FOR ALL PLAYERS.
I noticed that a lot of cards are well balanced. Yes, of course there are maybe just a couple of really strong cards, however, the game is updated time after time and effects or cards that are OP get Nerfed most of times. Furthermore, honestly, I think is Obvious that there will be always the possibility that a couple of cards still powerful: it is part of the game in itself… 
By the way, as I said before, the game is pretty well balanced.
After all, even if, yes there are few cards a little bit OP, normally there is the possibility to create a deck really not bad even after few time of gameplay (later in this review I’ll cover this point) and use decks that can mix functionality and fun.
Obviously, in rank games and in tournament there are decks more popular than others (META DECKS). However, a great part of the game is based even in fight AI and in friendly matches where u can see and find a good variety of decks, cards and heroes (is even true and I have to say that for my personal experience, DOMINIUM as archetype is used a lot).

So, in the end, even if there will be always cards a little bit too strong or heroes with better powers (it depends which patch is active), this doesn’t compromise the possibility to win matches with budget decks or decks that aren’t META decks and full of rare and epic cards. 
U can create a deck that u like (for example I like soldiers a lot) and, if it is a minimum balanced, IN MOST OF SITUATIONS u will have the opportunity to play a good match.

Of course in Spellweaver luck factor is important… I mean is a card game. So ok… u cannot think to win every time, nor with Budget decks, nor with advanced decks.

3)THIS GAME IS A REAL FREE TO PLAY ( NOOOT A PAY TO WIN).
A really good thing of this game however, is that even when u lose, it still a funny game and pretty, but even more important u can receive a pretty good reward.
Sould I be honest? Well… compared to others TCG which I have in mind (more than one…), rewards here, in terms of GOLD and FAME are pretty high in my opinion. If u win and even if u lose.
This point is important cause, thank this, lose in this game is not so frustrating and humiliating. Even when u play versus a strongest opponent, well u have the opportunity to play for, at the end of the match, earn a good amount of gold and fame.

This aspect of the game, brings few great consequences:
1)	OK… EVERYONE likes to WIIIN, but even if u lose the reward is good.
2)	This game, especially compared to others games I played, IS NOT PAY TO WIN.
 
Really. This game is not a pay to win, It is a real free to play…
Wait… maybe I’m crazy!
NO, really, listen…
Of course if u spend moneys, u can increase the possibility to find more cards and more rare, epics… and some… but honestly, I had access to good cards even after only 12/13 days of gameplay… (and I don’t have a lot of time to spend on this game…).
Even without to spend a penny, after a modest amount of time and a little bit of experience, is possible to build a respectable deck :)

Obviously, if u wanna win a lot in rank, things are a little bit different. Same for tournaments.
But after all, even in those contests, is just question of time: It's REALLY EASY and possible to play and continue to play well this game without spend moneys. U just need few more time for find enough packs but, for what is my experience, u can obtain enough good cards for free, and the opportunity to find rare and epics is not low (and, after all u can even craft what u need).

Obviously, Epic cards can give u a good advantage… and u can always find someone more expert than u or with a better deck, but 80% of times, u’ll have the opportunity to play a fair and balanced match (and even if u lose, the reward still pretty high!!!).
This is why this game IS NOT A PAY TO WIN. This for me is really important.
U know… a LOOOT of free to play, costs more than others (normal) games if u wanna have the opportunity to play those well or in a “normal” way. With Spellweaver is different :)

In conclusion, and I wanna thx u if u had the patience to read until this point, I think that Spellweaver is a pretty good game, funny, with good aspects and GOOD potential.

A great THX to everyone that read all… AND… MEET U ON SPELLWEAVER :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198027118178', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 2551, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1942, 'last_played': 1494180650}
review:
I would give this game a neutral recommendation,but Steam won't allow that so until either that happens or the game improves,I keep it as a no.My reasons for it are the balance issues and some awkward rules. The game itself is good, if you like Magic: The gathering, you will probably like this too. 

You know something is not right when you look at the top 10 players and 6 of them are with a Darkness deck. Basically there are 2 strong factions and if you play anything else you will struggle to win. 
Unlike in most games there are no counterspells and no reaction phase where you can react to an enemy spellcast. Combined with the fact that Darkness for instance has really cheap "Destroy Creature" cards and by cheap I mean they are often cheaper than the creature they destroy. Yes,the enemy can instantly kill most of your creatures without you being able to keep them alive and does this with the same or fewer resources. 
Example: 
"Destroy a creature with 2 atk or less"-2 mana,level 1
My collection of ~250 DIFFERENT cards has no creature with the same or less cost that has 3 attack or more and most that have a higher manacost get destroyed by just this card as well.This game really needs to have weaker or more expensive creature shots.

I know it seems like a bad reason to not recommend something,but when you play 6-7 out of 10 games against the very same decks and basically have no chance to win unless you do it as well the whole thing becomes extremely repetitive and loses diversity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076698165', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 15248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8745, 'last_played': 1608928316}
review:
After trying many of the existing card games I must say that Spellweaver deserved to be known as it is probably the best proposal:

- A real and generous free to play
It's probably the one that you'll need the less grind to come up with a decent card collection as every single game you play gives you gold to buy new cards, with no daily restriction of any sort. This plus regular campaign missions makes it easy to buy new packs every day. You will NEVER have so spend a dime to get anything in this game, you can get it all by just playing.

- An efficient ressource system
The level/mana combo gives an interesting strategy approach and the possibility to exchange a card to pick a mana one every turn removes the death mana plays you can find in other games

- No RNG cards
Don't count on RNG cards to win a game. Yeah, you're in charge!

- Daily tournaments
Some for free, some with a "ticket" entry. Tickets can easily be bought with in-game gold. Various types of game proposed makes it interesting to play.

- You can even gain real money
Yes you read it right. Every month there is a minimum poll of 250$ plus a percentage of the money spent in the game by all the players given the winner of the monthly tournament. Did I say the registration for this tournament was free? A serious taunt to competitive players!

I really encourage to try this game and if you need a little boost to get started just let me know, I'd be happy to sponsor you in game which will grant you a nice 75k gold to start with when creating a new account.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010339280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 8482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5708, 'last_played': 1522618643}
review:
Between this, Duelyst, Shadowverse, and (god forbid) Hearthstone, you should find what you're looking for. The best thing to remember going into online CCGs is that there's literally dozens of them, so before you get invested, shop around for what suits your tastes best.

Spellweaver in particular offers a good mix of different strategies, though I'd say it's skewed towards combo and control over aggro or midrange. Mana screw is still a thing that happens, though not nearly as bad as MTG or even Eternal. 60 card decks, and games are expected to go on quite a bit longer than most of the 'fast paced' CCGs out there, with each player allotted 15 minutes to play out their side of the game- so if you take too long on too many turns, you might suddenly have to play speed-chess to avoid losing by default. Also, the reward structure had me really skeptical at first, but it's not nearly as bad as something like Hearthstone or Faeria, and they're actually more generous with the rewards as you play longer instead of frontloading it like Duelyst or Shadowverse.

Don't really have much else to say, since I only play casually. I didn't think I'd like it, but I keep coming back. If you're interested, give it a whirl.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037780770', 'num_games_owned': 729, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1483589231}
review:
There's nothing I hate more than forced tutorials. Especially crappily designed forced tutorials. Especially when the game itself is clunky and slow to play compared to other TCG's on the market, for a game that's marketed based on 'speed ratings' of monsters.

And most of all, especially when the tutorial continually resets your moves and forces you to play a certain specific way without telling you HOW it wants you to move. Like, the game sure looks interesting, but no matter what I did, the game just kept telling me "Give it your best shot! You can do it!" but then "Oops, you lost a monster! Reset! Oops you can't play that instant spell now! Reset!"

It just kept doing stupid crap over and over and frankly, I don't care enough to play past it or try and figure it out. I have Hex, I just wanted to try something new. Back to Hex I go!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971174307', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 958, 'last_played': 1496398200}
review:
Ich spiele nun seit vielen Jahren TCG, vorallem Magic. Spellweaver ist eine absolute Neuheit in diesem Genre. Es vereint altbewertes mit neuen Spielmechaniken. Es ist sehr einfach zu erlernen und dennoch erfordert es einen alles ab, da man unendliche viele Taktikmöglichkeiten hat. Die Community ist sehr hilfsbereit und wächst eigentlich von Tag zu Tag.  
Solltet ihr das Spiel probieren wollen, bitte sichert euch unbedingt 75.000 gratis Gold. Gebt einfach diesen Code/Schlüssel ein: JDBML4 
Tägliche/Wöchentliche/Monatliche Turniere sowie jede menge Spezialevents machen dieses Spiel eigentlich zum Suchtfaktor. Es erwarten dich eine Vielzahl von täglichen Quests, die eine sehr hohe Variablität haben, es wird also definitiv nicht langweilig oder gar eintönig. Es ist KEIN - Pay2Win - ihr bekommt durch die Quests, Turniere, durchs normale Spielen immer wieder neue Booster oder Gold, dass ihr nicht lange benötigt um ein tolles Deck zu basteln. Optimal geeignet auch für Neueinsteiger. In einem Bosster befinden sich 10 Karten, in einem Kleinen (gibt eig nur bei Quests) nur 4. Und das beste an dem ganzen ist, selbst als Anfänger habt ihr wirklich realistische Chancen ein Turnier zu gewinnen und coole preise abzustauben, da viele Turniere auch auf das jeweilige Level bezogen sind, bzw. auch ponly für Anfänger sind. Also nicht länger warten.. Installieren und rocken (:

author: {'steamid': '76561198330323437', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 37465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15793, 'last_played': 1643300472}
review:
优点：
1.献祭机制大大减少了卡地的几率，妈妈再也不用担心我卡地了
2.创立“速度”概念，低速生物不能攻击高速生物；战场分为前线和支援线，增加了游戏趣味
3.游戏内自带各种比赛，轮抽赛、欢乐赛、地区赛（误）、水晶赛、大师赛。。。。。体验在各种比赛中与外国友人酣战的快感吧
4.AI做工精美，背景音乐也很不错
5.集卡难度不是太高（我玩了1个半月，除了蓝红卡其他基本满4）

缺点：
1.玩家比较少，试炼（相当于炉石的竞技场）经常10分钟才匹到人；但各种比赛的时候参加的人还是很多的
2.新卡更新太慢（目前貌似只出了1个新拓展？）
3.网络偶尔有波动（貌似主要是电信网）

author: {'steamid': '76561197968357064', 'num_games_owned': 11834, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 5227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4270, 'last_played': 1609454610}
review:
Velmi sympaticka fantasy karetni hra od bulharskych vyvojaru. Bohuzel nemuzu porovnavat s [i]Magic the Gathering[/i] (MTG), ktery jsem jeste nezkousel, takze budu mluvit hlavne o [i]Hearthstone (HS)[/i].

Hned na zacatek musim rict, ze se tomuto nezavislemu studiu povedla zabavna hra, ktera je hezkou alternativou k mainstreamovejsimu a pomerne lehce ovladatelnemu HS. [i]Spellweaver[/i] je v nekolika ohledech komplikovanejsi, takze jeho osvojeni zabere relativne vic casu (ale predpokladam, ze je stale mnohem snazsi nez MTG). Je zde nekolik hernich mechanismu jinych:
1) k vykladani karet hrac potrebuje uroven a manu; oboji nepribyva automaticky, ale vzdy jednou za kolo lze pridat jedno nebo druhe pomoci karet s nulovou hodnotou zvanymi Svatyne
2) jednotky operuji krome klasickeho HP/ATK atributu take s [b]rychlosti (SP)[/b] - pomalejsi stvoreni nemohou utocit na ty rychlejsi, ani je blokovat
3) kolo je rozlozeno na 3 faze - vylozeni karet, utok, posileni/dodatecne vylozeni kouzel ci stvoreni; ovsem [b]kola se prolinaji![/b], cili pokud si schovate manu nebo mate jednotky, ktere jeste neutocily, tak i behem souperova tahu muzete blokovat a sesilat kouzla
4) ve hre jsou [b]dve linie[/b], v prvni je pechota, v te druhe letajici a podpurna stvoreni (nebo do ni muzete "schovat" i melee jednotky, ty pak ale nemuzou utocit)
5) na bok herni plochy se umistuji [b]artefakty[/b] a trvalejsi kouzla, ktera je pro soupere tezsi odstranit a vetsinou ovlivnuji celou hru
4) na samotne kolo mate limit pomerne benevolentni, ale celkove je zapas omezen na [b]15 (ranked hra) a 20 minut (friendly match)[/b], coz nekdy vede ke kontumacni vyhre (komu vyprsi cas, ackoliv ma treba vice HP, ten prohrava)
5) obecne pravidla vyhry/porazky jsou hodne zvlastni - k vasi prohre staci, aby vam krome casu [b]dosly karty v decku[/b] (i kdyz na ruce jich muzete mit milion) nebo dokonce kdyz souper [b]dosahne alespon 40HP[/b] (zakladni HP je 20) - pak potkavate podivne buildy pouze s kouzly bez jednotek, ktere maji za ukol pouze toto a stavi na vpodstate neznicitelnych artefaktech (ve hre je totiz strasne malo karet, ktere je rusi) a prohrajete s plnym poctem HP jen kvuli tomu, ze se souper masivne "doleci"

To vsechno celkove usti (podle meho nazoru) v o neco slozitejsi osvojeni hernich mechanik nez u HS. I karet mate mnohem vic. [b]Minimum je 60, ale lze az 100[/b]. Od jedne karty muzete mit [b]maximalne 4 kopie[/b] (Svatyni s nulovou hodnotou muzete mit samozrejme mnohem vic - jsou nutne k navysovani many a levelu hrdiny). Ovsem cim vic karet, tim zase mensi pravdepodobnost, ze si vytahnete tu, co potrebujete.

Hrdinu je 6 typu (aspektu): 
3 za stranu Dobra ([b]Rad[/b] - andele, knezi apod.; [b]Moudrost[/b] - kouzelnici; [b]Priroda[/b] - elfove) 
a 3 za Zlo ([b]Zkaza[/b] - nemrtvi a nekromanti; [b]Vztek[/b] - samani; [b]Nadvlada[/b] - upiri). Temto aspektum odpovidaji barvou karty a vetsinou i cele balicky, ovsem hrace to nijak nesvazuje a videl jsem i decky kombinujici upiry+andely napriklad... Variant bude tedy pomerne dost, i kdyz samotnych karet zatim tolik neni v porovnani s HS.

Hra je jak uz je zvykem f2p a musim rict, ze free itemu ziskavate z questu opravdu dost. Zkompletovat sbirku je ale urcite lehci craftingem nebo pomoci premiovych balicku, takze kdo do hry da realne penize, bude to mit o neco snazsi. Dobre je najit si na forech nejaky Quickstart Guide pro co nejrychlejsi pochopeni interfacu a hry. Idealni je [b]pouzit pri registraci referencni kod[/b] nejakeho jineho hrace (muj je mimochodem [b]SJS6U4[/b]), ktery vam da 75k goldu do zacatku pri jeho zadani behem prvnich 24 hodin. Dale je dulezite co nejrychleji (bud levelingem sveho profilu = vyhravanim zapasu, nebo za goldy) odemknout vsechny oblasti na herni mape, protoze se vam v nich pak v intervalech nabizi zminene ukoly, kde je mozne vyhrat nejcasteji goldy (na nakup karet a vstup do turnaju) nebo primo karty/balicky ci modre gemy, ktere se jinak kupuji jen za real money. Vzdy je mozno aktivovat jen 1 ukol v dane oblasti - tech je 6, stejne jako aspektu. Takze davejte pozor pri jejich vyberu.

Co se tyce vzhledu, je to na muj vkus trochu moc "ruske", do cehoz nemaji Bulhari stylove daleko - vsechno ma na okraji zlate lemovani a vsemozne kudrlinky. Neni to vylozene skarede, ale proti HS preci jen trochu kycovite. Nastesti samotne karty jsou nakresleny pomerne hezky. Dulezite je, ze je to HW absolutne nenarocne. Snad by jen mohli pridat custom zmenu meritka nekterych prvku. Parametry karet a prilozena kouzla jsou znazorneny pomerne malymi symboly a i kdyz pri najeti kurzorem lze kartu zvetsit, neskodilo by celou herni plochu mirne priblizit, coz bohuzel nejde. Stejne tak nejde menit velikost okna, pokud mate zobrazeni windowed.
Plusem taky je, ze je hra [b]kompletne prelozena do cestiny[/b] - bohuzel ne bez chyb; nektere preklady (i kdyz jsou to vyjimky) nejsou uplne idealni a meni puvodni smysl, coz vede ke spatnemu pochopeni vlastnosti (funkci) karty.

Osobne jsem stale ve fazi poznavani fines hernich mechanismu a achievementy jsou na muj vkus hodne tezke (napr. musite nasbirat vsechny karty z expansion sady Usvit hrdinu). Presto me to bavi a jsem zvedav, co s touto karetni hrou jeste Bulhari vymysli. Zatim se snazi dost - pro novacky i pokrocile je nekolikrat do mesice spousta rychlych soutezi. K tomu draft turnaje, kde lze i vymenovat karty (zatim presne nevim jak). Cekani na soupere je logicky delsi (v radu minut) nez v HS s milionovou hracskou zakladnou, ale da se to prezit (zatim).

[h1]60%[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198202434008', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 26286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1126, 'last_played': 1627573572}
review:
最直白的说法可能就是  炉石×万智牌  不过在各种细节上有很多亮点。
从攻防（平A）上来讲也是介于两者之间。即使结合了两者的进攻方式，比万智牌可以更加灵活地选择目标，比炉石可以更加灵活地防守对手，但是配合上非常有特色的速度系统，也能让让进攻和防御的组织，变成了一个新手需要多加练习，老手可以发挥自己操作的技术。
从土地/费用上来讲，其特点在于每回合除了可能要加费，也可能需要加英雄等级。而且加入了一个小检索系统了以后，不会再担心没土地而卡手了。这个大家可以自己去试试。
最后，谢谢读到这里，别忘了推荐码（有金币领）9NMGQW。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025559598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 218976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83800, 'last_played': 1676107264}
review:
Hearthstone bored me to death. 

I quit after a week of play... my roommate had me play one of his decks a year later and I went 10-1. Yawn to the max.

Anyway, he also introduced me to magic years ago in college and I loved playing alongside a couple brews and greenery. However; deck building seemed like such a chore so I would only use his constructed decks. I mean, what college student wants to dig through a bag of thousands of cards or go spend money at a card shop? Not this one. 

Enter spell weaver. I was looking for a new ccg for the house to play and I stumbled upon this little gem. Man, I have not been disappointed. 

You see: I was immediately taken in by the free card availibility, ease of deck building, and magic-esque depth. Soon... the addiction set in. I wanted to brawl with the big names like cruel, lore, and ssslock. 

So, I grinded my way up to two ladder decks for literally no money. At this point I had been playing on and off for a few months and I needed more. I decided it was time to pay these great devs so I could play all the decks. It was and will continue to be worth it. My 200 bucks a year gaming budget went to dream reactor and they freaking deserve it! 

I will admit that there have been frustrating times in the meta right before the first expansion was released and this stayed the same for a few weeks after. The best part is I now have nothing to complain about. The game is balanced so well that there are a lot of competitive decks in tier one!

Anyway, here are my thoughts on the positives of the game:
1. The art is very nice and you'll enjoy getting the cards with every quest you complete or pack you open. 
2. The mechanics are sound and will challenge your desire for thought provoking combat. 
3. The player base is very welcoming and helpful. 
4. Constant balance changes are welcome and allow for a heath meta.
5. You can win real money in the client from the monthly masters.
6. A variety of modes, from drafts, arena, tournaments, ladder, friendly to AI matches. 
7. New features added every few months to keep things fresh. 

I mean, that's pretty darn good for a small development team. 

Now, there are cons too... no review would be complete without them. 

1. The tutorial still could use some work. I've made videos explaining how to win the tutorial and mechanics that aren't explained. (youtube shrining spellweaver)
2. Bugs happen and the team does respond fast so it's not game breaking.
3. Costs are confusing to new players. You get a lot of gold for free, if you're willing to play a lot you can literally get the game for free.

Yeah, I really don't have a lot to complain about... this game is super generous for free players and priced fine for completionists. 
You get daily quests that give you so many cards and currency so what's to complain about? 

Anyway, check it out. This is the card game I've been looking for since university and I'm glad I found it.

Add me in game under "an album" if you need tips, someone to test decks with or anything else. Happy weaving!

author: {'steamid': '76561198134281837', 'num_games_owned': 967, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 61422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49341, 'last_played': 1538692855}
review:
Wer schon immer ein Kartenspiel nach Magic the Gathering wollte kann es nun kostenlos nachspielen.
Zusammen mit den Helden entwickelt man eine von drei Strategien:
1. Die klassische: Reduzier die HP vom Gegner(Helden) auf 0.
2. Das Gegenteil: Bringe deinen Held auf 40.
3. Das Deck: Bringe deinen Gegner dazu seine letzte Deckkarte zu verlieren.
Der Einstieg(vorallem ins PvP) mag durch die mangelnde Sammlung an eigenen Karten schwer sein, aber dank des leveln,  einmalige Freischalten von Questorten, der täglichen Quest und des möglichen Herstellen kann man über Zeit seine Sammlung ausbauen und so selbst auf Veteranen aufholen.
Die täglichen Quest rangieren von einfachen Aufgaben bis zu sehr seltenen(epischen) ab. Manche erfordern speziellere Sachen wie PvP(Ranked/Freundschaftsspiele) oder gar die Teilnahme(Siege) in sogenannten Prüfungen.
Manchmal verlangen sie das Spielen(Siegen) mit Helden von einer Fraktion - aber das hängt direkt mit der Fraktion ab in der sie auftauchen. So wirst du in der Ordnungsfraktionkarte nur Ordnungshelden nehmen müssen. Also keine Weisheitshelden usw.(die man zu dem frühen Zeitpunkt noch nicht hätte).
Man kann bis zu 4 Questorte freischalten je Fraktion und die Quest spawnen alle 8h in einer Fraktion(solange es welche gibt in denen noch keine Quests angenommen bzw. schon alle möglichen Questorte belegt sind).
Die Akademie hat eine seltene Quest alle 3 Tage.
DIe Questbelohnungen können sein:
Gold(wenig bis viel)
2 ungewöhnliche Karten
1/2 seltene Karte(n)
1 epische/heroische
1 Spezielle Folienkarte
Kleine Packungen(4 Karten)
Normale Packungen(1 seltene+ 2 ungewöhnliche 7 gewöhnliche)
Tickets(für Draft und Prüfungen und manche Turniere)
Das schöne an den Quests mit Kartenbelohnungen ist, dass man nur Karten kriegt, die man nicht schon 4x hat. Sprich genau die, die man braucht weil man sie nicht so oft hat!

Es gibt 3 Spielmodi:
PvE(gegen AI). Man kann wählen welche Schwierigkeitsgrad hat(außer mehr Ruhm keine Unterschiede).
Normales PvP: Entweder um die monatliche Bestenliste oder Freundschaftsspiele.
Prüfungen: Erlange soviele Siege(max 10) bevor du 3 Niederlagen hast. Du baust dein Deck mittels Kartenwahl aus gezeigten.

Die Turniere lassen dich dein Deck vor Antritt wählen und bestreitest dann je nach Form unterschiedlich viele Spiele.
Die veränderten Crystal Fiestas lassen dich jetzt Gold in Kristalle umwandeln! Je mehr Siege zu dabei in diesem Tournierformat erringst, desto mehr Kristalle bekommst du am Ende heraus.
Die neu hinzugekommenen Draftturniere lassen dich wie bei den Prüfungen aus gezeigten Karten eine wählen.
Das besondere jedoch ist, dass die gezeigten Karten aus den Packs sind, die man als zusätzliche Kosten mitbringt + die extra kleinen Packungen von dem Turnier selbst. Wobei nach jeder Wahl die Karten an den nächsten weitergegeben werden. Nach dem Turnier behält man alle ausgewählten Karten! Also wählt weise aus welche Karten ihr haben wollt und euch natürlich den Sieg bringen.

Viel Spass!

Ein kleiner Diamant, der nurnoch feinpoliert werden muss um super zu sein!

review:
I was positively surprised by this game. It's not too complex (MtG) nor too simple (Hearthstone), and their FtP model is actually very well conceived.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058897818', 'num_games_owned': 1157, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 3305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2860, 'last_played': 1490706808}
review:
Tra i tanti TCG che ho provato questo è quello con il regolamento meglio strutturato.
Sostanzialmente è un clone di Magic, ma ne risolve in gran parte il difetto principale: l'aleatorietà del mana (mana flood/screw) che rovina buona parte delle partite di MTG.
Oltre ad avere un sistema a doppia risorsa (livello nella "disciplina", cioè il colore di mana e mana totali che sono incolori), quando si gioca una reliquia si pesca anche una carta. In questo modo si attenua la piaga del mana flood.
Per il mana screw invece c'è la possibilità, una volta per turno, di scartare una delle proprie carte dalla mano, guardare le prime 5 carte del mazzo e aggiungere una reliquia alla propria mano se si trova in quelle 5 carte (se non c'è abbiamo perso una carta) e poi rimescolare.
Capita lo stesso qualche volta di avere sfortuna e pescare solo reliquie o non pescarne, ma rispetto a Magic questa eventualità è ridottissima e ci si può conentrare sul divertimento.
Un'altra meccanica interessante è quella della velocità delle creature, che funziona in modo simile a "volare" in MTG, ma è su 4 livelli (4 velocità) anziché 2 (volare e non volare).
Le modalità di gioco prevedono sfide contro l'IA (che è discreta, ho visto di molto peggio in giro), contro giocatori reali (sia ranked che non) e una modalità "Trial" simile all'arena di Heartstone o a un draft di MTG, molto divertente.
C'è un sistema di crafting e una sorta di campagna single player: ci sono dei siti sulla mappa che periodicamente propongono delle quest e relativa ricompensa.
Nel complesso un ottimo prodotto, ben strutturato e divertente. Consigliato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165829795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 18007, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14920, 'last_played': 1592646979}
review:
Spellweaver is the best free CCG game that I played with gameplay similar to MtG. The inovative mechanic in Spellweaver is Divine Offering - discard a card from your hand and search the top 5 cards of your deck for a shrine card (a type of card that grants mana and draws a card or an aspect level - requirements for playing cards; some even grant skills to your hero). I personally think it's genius and on a side note makes MtG much, much better. 
 The business model is nice and it's pretty generous in the long run. Apart from the gold you gain from matches (even the ones against AI grant gold so it's totally feasible to only play vs a computer opponent) there are quests that grant rewards like gold, cards of certain rarity (if I remember corectly you dont receive extra copies of a card you already have 4 copies of, unless you already have all the cards in that rarity), card packs, trial tickets (mode you make a deck from random cards and complete against other players with rewards based on you number of wins achieved when you loose 3 times or win 10 times), the 12 pack box and crystals (the premium curency). You can do maximum 6 quests at a time - 1 for each faction zone. Faction zones unlock after you unlock the starter deck for that faction (you get 1 free starter every 5 levels and you can buy 1 with 40k gold). After you unlock a zone there are 4 locations with challenges that once completed will become possible quest locations and you can only take 1 quest per zone at a time. You can complete multiple quests at the same time but after you complete them new ones will be available in a zone at a time after 8h.
The items that are only available with crystals are card backs, boxes of packs, premium packs (gives the same cards as a normal pack but doesn't give duplicates unless you have 4 copies of each card in a rarity), foil packs (gives foil version of cards) and the campaign mode (gives a decent amount of cards from the Good aspects: Order, Nature and Wisdom; and a hero - the cards can drop from packs but the hero must be crafted). 
Speaking of crafting, there is such a system but the conversion rate for rare cards is steep.
Since the game is free to play I suggest you give it a shot, but stay away from the PvP until level 10 - 15 when you will understand most of the mechanics and have a bit of a collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008842185', 'num_games_owned': 527, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 15395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14877, 'last_played': 1479251516}
review:
The game was ok at first, considering it was a relatively new CCG game, but it took a turn for the bad.

Biggest problems:
-Balancing problems. Certain removal cards (against certain types) are mostly restricted to 1 color. You fall against someone who plays those cards and you don't have no access to removal against it, you can basically resign the game. If you splash more colors, you run a big risk of getting ressource screwed and ending up with an unplayable hand
-High cost to get into... it is F2P and with playing you can get cards, but with the recent expansion getting a reasonable playing deck is hard
-Ranked system has no full reset after certain intervals. you can decay but still, no full reset makes climbing frustratring, especially if you queue up against a deck you cannot win at all at regular intervals (mostly because of the balancing)
-Frustration! Several small issues, but them having a huge frustration factor is "unfun". While the issues are not game breaking, the frustration they create being disproportionately high is a big negative point.
-For me with the last expansion my opinion shifted. Before I had hopes for spellweaver to evolve in a good way, based on a solid base, but the reality of last expansion and the recent evolution of the game, for me, the game is in a downward trend, the frustration factor will slowly but steadily outweigh the fun factor and overshadow the fun (at least in the current state)


Good points:
-Tournaments have a decent frequency and can be fun (also can be frustratring if you get paired only with decks you cannot beat due to balancing), but in overall a good point
-Abilities from heros and color splashing makes for interesting deck building (if you got the cards for it)
-Divine offering (in game ressource management) that is a good way to mitigate bad mulligan hands.
-RNG mostly relegated to topdecking


Neutral
-High amount of decks that are remotely playable, with several archetypes. While experimentation and having different play styles being viable is nice, it also adds to the frustration factor from above (especially in conjunction with the balancing). if you queue up against a deck with a game winning card you cannot remove because of your colors, you can insta-concede. often bad matchups are very heavily leaning, while there are some closer to 60-40, many bad matchups are closer to 90-10 
-Bugfixing is fairly fast and balancing updates are also fast enough, but the frequency at which card change (sometimes complete redo), can become frustrating (both if you played with them and having to change your deck strategy and when you played against them before the change and got completly steamrolled by them and having the feeling you could do absolutely nothing against it, partly to the asymmetric removal distibution)

author: {'steamid': '76561198022943137', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1153, 'last_played': 1478101283}
review:
Really nice adaptation of the hearthstone model. Plays like a more timing-based hearthstone with a bit more complexity. Definitely marginally more skill-based than HS, and the f2p model is actually pretty good - its very easy to grind for cards compared to HS. You get way more quests per day as you go along. The factions are relatively well balanced and have good identity - although as someone new to the game I do find the purple faction a little overwhelming at times. There is absolutely a good deck for each faction though, as well as nice two-colour decks. The community is nice and competitive, the new player tournaments are fucking rad, basically like playing an fnm right at your computer. I look forward to trying out for the masters tournament and whatnot once I finish getting my deck together.

Only downsides would be maybe that there isn't an insane amount of card variation at the time being, but that's just a symptom of the game being young. All in all I'd recommend the hell out of this, I've tried Magic Online, Hearthstone, Magic Duels, Infinity Wars, Might and Magic Duels, and I have to say this game strikes the best balance of fun/ease of use and rewarding complexity.

However it's likely never ever going to get properly fixed in that department, so i can't personally "fully" recommend this game..

It's a shame really because this card game could have been one of the absolute greats, sadly it doesn't quite delivers what it actually tries to promise.. author: {'steamid': '76561198025617933', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1478264162}
review:
This game, along with Faeria, is the best CCG out there. Hearthstone got ruined with the all the pro-casual, rng game winning effects, and WOTC don't really give a shit about Duels Online and the others.  

It has a unique resource system, where you can play one shrine card per turn. You can choose to either upgrade your rank, allowing you to play more powerful cards, or gain more mana so you can play MORE cards. On top of that, you can declare blocks and attack targets (so it's a mixture between how HS and MtG does it), and there is a speed stat for every creature as well. Creatures can only attack and block creatures with equal or lower speed. It's very fun and addictive. There are a bunch of factions with different "hero powers" and faction cards, the card art is very intriguing and just gameplay as a whole feels smooth enough, without sacrificing complexity. 

The biggest flaw is that you can't adjust the video settings. Full screen is all you're getting.

All in all, i can totally recommend this game. The initial impression was that this was trying to be a P2W CCG cash grab, but after a few hours i can honestly say that it's pretty entertaining. I will be playing this more and will update if i change my mind about recommending the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322460707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 42275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14379, 'last_played': 1540053067}
review:
Hallo liebe Freunde ,
von richtig guten und anspruchsvollen Computerspielen.
Ich spiele seit vielen Jahren Computerspiele und habe noch nie ein Review geschrieben.
Oder habe sonst irgend welche Kommentare über ein Spiel abgeben.
Aber Spellweaver hat mich der Art begeistert, das ich mal einen Kommentar abgeben muß.
Spellweaver macht von Anfang an richtig Spass.
Das Tutorial ist sehr gut und witzig gemacht.
Selbst Spieler die noch nie ein Kartenspiel auf dem Computer gespielt haben, werden gut und gezielt in die Materie eingeführt.
Jetzt nach 3 Wochen muss ich sagen: Das Spiel war bisher niemals langweilig und ich glaube das wird es auch nie werden.
Das Spiel ist einfach genial und die KI ist anspruchsvoll.
Auch das Spiel gegen die weltweit verteilten Mitspielern läuft richtig gut ab.
Spellweaver ist sehr abwechslungsreich und jedes Spiel ist anders.
Auch die sehr unterschiedlichen Helden und Kreaturen die man spielen kann, tragen zu dem interessanten Spielverlauf bei.
Zum Schluss noch eins: Bisher habe ich fast immer nur Rollen - oder Actionspiele wie Everquest, Rift,Rappelz,TESO und Diablo gespielt.Auch Jagged Allianz fand ich richtig gut.
Spellweaver ist mein erstes Kartenspiel und trotzdem finde ich es sehr gut.

Viel Spass beim spielen , man sieht sich : )

Haeveraner

review:
Do you like [b]MtG[/b], but realy hate the [b]MtG-Online-Client[/b]? Do you enjoyed [b]Hearthstone[/b] for some time, but then get frustrated by random efects and lacking interaction?

Then I strongly recomend this collectable card game to you!

In contrast to Hearthstone you can block enemy creatures, and use instants and activated abilities at two spots of the oponents turn, therefore Spellweaver becomes [b]more interactive than Hearthstone[/b], but does not become as unusable as MTGO.

In contrast to MtG creatures do have four different level of speed, while in MtG there are mostly two - flying and not flying, which influence the possible attacs and blocks (so it is possible two attac the oponent directly or his creatures).

One last point I want to make here is the following, there is almost [b]no mana flood or screw[/b] in Spellweaver for two reason:

[olist]

    [*]You can once per turn put one card below your deck, lock a the top 5 cards, put any land among the in your hand and the rest below your deck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115551888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 25190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21039, 'last_played': 1509535989}
review:
[h1]General rating : 9/10[/h1]

Updated 16/11/2016 post balance patches. Rating increased from 7/10 to 9/10.

This is a great game. A really great but unknown game. This is a CCG easy to get into but with a lot of depth. It got me hooked badly. I've played MTG since the first ravnica expension, I've been multi legend in Hearthstone and I've tried a variety of other card games including Faeria, Hex, TESL yet I ended up only playing Spellweaver. I wish this game had more players but the producer is a small bulgarian studio and that's their only game. They simply do not have the ressources to advertise this. So it goes under the radar.

[h1]PROS: [/h1]
- Great gameplay : much better then Hearthstone and its clones like TESL. Honnestly I played MTG for over a decade (from 1st ravnica expansion to Innistrad) and now I only play Spellweaver that should tell something. The actual mechanics are a mix of MTG and the new wave of digital CCG's that make this game so unjoyable to play.
- Easy to learn, very hard to master : it's easy enough to jump in but truely mastering deck building and especially playing in conquest format tournaments (each player plays a best of 2 with 3 decks) that's on another level really.
- 6 colors each with its strenghs and weaknesses that you can freely mix. There is white, red, blue, black and green and these fulfill somewhat different roles as in MTG. And then there is purple. Oh boy, this is the most enjoable color in my (very humble and completly biased) opinion. It has a wide range of cards from sexy vampires to heavy board clears, to selective card discard to implants and mutants. If you ever thought how MTG could implant a 6th color sucessfully, well here it is.
- 18 heroes, and more to come : each of them has a very specific heropower and you can play any of them with any color combinaison but keep in mind that their base heropower requires a specific color (changes for each hero). Also you can "learn" new heropowers through shrines during a game. A shrine is like a land card in MTG but it can be used either to gain a level (more below) or mana / an ability.
- Best ressource system of any card game on the market. I consider MTG's 5 colored mana a very succesful ressource system. But Spellweaver improves on that. Mana and levels of colors are separated. So let's take a simple example. You have a basic red shrine (land card). you can play it either to gain a red level, or to gain one mana and draw a card. Levels are requirement (they are not consumed upon playing cards) while mana is a ressource (consumed about playing cards). This means there can be cards that cost let's say 4 mana only but they are unplayable by agro decks because they require 4 levels (agro goes at 2 levels usually). Basically this solves an issue i've encountered a lot in card games like hearthstone : when you make a very strong creature for control decks, agro decks tend also to use it because they have no reason not to. But in Spellweaver they simply can't if their deck can't afford to go at high levels ! This means they can (and have) created very swingy control cards that agro decks can't play ! :)
- Good mix of agro, midrange, control and combo decks. Every type of deck is playable. The meta is currently mostly midrangey.
- F2P model is generous although less then a long time ago. Also for a small initial investment you can get very far. I'm usually in top 50 and I've spiked at 1st place in the midst of a month (rewards are at end of the month). I've only played for 2 months and spent 40 $ total. With this amount of time and money I wouldn't be able to do anything serious on a more expansive game.
- Crafting allows to create the cards you want if you can't get them in packs. Keep in mind that the economic system is similar to hearthstone (Collectible Card Game) not like MTG or Hex (Trading Card Games). You don't trade with other players. You build up your own permanent collection through packs and crafting.
- In built tournament system : Not only Spellweaver has regular automated pvp tournaments with different formats, rewards and duration, but there is also a championship series. you can qualify through small tournaments into a bigger one into a monthly one with the best players. Alternatively you can be qualified by being in top 10 ladder at the end of the month. There are 16 places for this monthly championship finales (6 through qualifiers, 10 for top 10 ladder). The winner gets real money, the others get a lot of ingame currency.
- Good game interface + works even on bad laptops. That was an important point to me
- 3 daily quests that can give up to (!!!) 12 free packs each (very rare quest, I got it once in 2 month). One quest pops every 8 hours in your game. You can have up to 7 quests at once.

[h1]CONS :[/h1]
Mythic rarity introduced in summer 2016 makes f2p a bit harder. The heroes are mythic rarity cards so they are very expensive to craft so you rely heavily on luck to open them or on the bundle that gives 3 random heroes once for money. Eventually you will have them and they are all playable (no completly useless hero) but some are better objectively for aiming at top 10. The good point is that some starter heroes are top level.
- Cosmetic/Flavour point : The lore could use some rework. Some things don't really make sense in the lore. Also some art isn't great (Lord Karthas supposed to be the huge badass vampire is looking like a teenager with a stick :s))
- The tutorial is barebones. And after the tutorial you are forced into playing a white soldier deck (like a weenie white of MTG) as your first starter deck. But fortunately you automatically unlock other colors' starting deck by levelling up or you can buy them with ingame currency (gold) to get them faster. If you have some card game experience and don't mind playing a simple agro deck in the beginning, this shouldn't be much of an issue.

If you have found this review helpful please throw a like.

[b]You can use my referral code to get 75k bonus gold when you create you account. Copy this : Y8B8FV

If you want any help, you can contact me (name : Darksilver) ingame or on the official game forums (I don't check steam forums) I'm usually very active :) [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198022199787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1475153775}
review:
Для начала стоит сказать, что игра с первого взгляда меня порадовала, однако потом начался дикий треш! И вот мы переходим к сути проблемы:
1. В игре очень мало карт...( от сюда вытикает много проблем ) и из-за проблем с количеством карт полностью пропадает интерес ( есть 3-5 играбельных колод карт, все остольное это либо чистейший рандом без мозможност инормально играть или просто бред ) , игровая механника так же страдает из-за недостатка вариации карт...
2. Донат! Я понимаю, что донат необходим для развития проекта и для полного выхода игры в массы, однако, если вы не собираетесь донатить или собираетесь донатить мало, то даже не устанавливайте эту игру!  Поясняю: казалось бы раз мало карт то и получить их все не составит труда, но нет... есть дико имбалансные карты ( играть стандартными колодами против них невозможно! ни как! какой бы вы про. игрок не были, вы просто не сможете играть ) как связан с этим доант? А вот так! тебе придеться донатить и донатить пока ты не выбьешь нужную карту, тебе будут попадаться стандартные карты, и все тут, открой 20 бустеров и тебе не хватит, что бы играть на уровне с другими!!! 
3. Механника! Это уже личные придирки: начнем с нескольких способностей которые, как мне показалось, реализованны достаточно тупо, одна из способностей: ПОЛЕТ!!!! Тут мой зад начинает пылать огнем тысячи адских горнил!!!! Все мы вспоминаем МТГ ( мб именно из-за МТГ у меня так горит очаг, но не уверен) В этой же игре полет такой, он дает право атаковать с задней линии и все!!! все больше толку от него нет, тут же смотрим на юнитов со способностью "дальнобойный" мб он тоже может атаковать с задних рядов? А вот х.. вам, но это же не логично скажете вы, да - отвечу я! Вся механника построенно на разности скоростей у персонажей, не важно летает он или нет, важно кто на сколько быстр!! И по мне это просто катострофа сознания!! Так же проблема с механникой нападения и обороны( опять же, личное мнение ) Ты своим существом выбираешь кого атаковать из существ, но противник может поставить другое существо вместо того которое ты выбрал! Как по мне, так это бред! И подобных моментов в игре очень много!
В любом случае, это ваше время и деньги! Всего плохого!
